campaign.story:
Woody CAR
Each Woody car is unique, made almost entirely of natural environmentally friendly materials. It is the first and only model of electric ride-on car for children in the world that is made of wood. 
It consists of a carefully designed wooden structure, suitable for rough children’s play, soft inflatable wheels, which offer a softer, quieter ride for the child and provide a good grip on any surface. 
We create woody exclusively from quality wood supplied by local suppliers and the frame made of stainless steel and corrosion protection, which enables a long service life in any environment.
Crafting every Woody CAR takes best craftsmanship and selection of finest raw materials.
All Woody CARs are hand build
Car body is made from finest lightweight BB grade wood with enhanced grain properties.
Only selected materials are used for crafting Woody CAR
Custom made full metal galvanized chassis parts are designed for years of corrosion resistance and rough playing time.
Durable corrosion proof steel parts
Soft inflatable rubber wheels with center bearing greatly improve ride quality, grip and durability over hard plastic wheels and reduce ride noise on hard surfaces.
Enjoy all the benefits of soft real rubber wheels
Big capacity 12V 12Ah battery offers superb play time. It can be charger inside the vehicle or removed for indoor charging  (indor charging kit sold separately). Need more oomph for longer rides? Ask for second battery and swap it with ease so the fun does not stop. 
Powerful two-wheel drive motors will make sure ride is newer boring, on or off-road. There are fast/slow and reverse gears for easy accommodation to any driving situation. 
Mimicking real car controls can help youngsters understand how they work
Latest addition to Woody CAR feature is wireless remote control of the vehicle! To ease learning curve and to provide us, parents, with more secure and reassuring way to monitor our children at play we introduced this optional feature. With remote control you have full control of the Woody CAR up to 30 meters/yards away.
This incudes left/right steering, forward/reverse with 3 selectable speeds (low/medium/high) and emergency stop button to cut off all controls from rider. 
During Kickstarter campaign backers will get this feature in all specifications of Woody CAR for free!
With remote control you can have full control of the vehicle
Every child deserves to feel unique. Woody CAR makes it possible for you to offer your child a unique gift that will accompany him everywhere.
We are proud that the first and only wooden ride-on car in the world is made in a country known for its tradition of making wooden products. How else would we come up with this idea :)?
Future generations will have to pay even more attention to environmental issues. With Woody toys, they will start preparing themselves for this as early as their childhood. 
With fully Wooden and steel frame we try to use as little as possible non-natural materials. This is our way of promoting use of natural materials instead of plastics in toy manufacturing.
To make every car special like its owner every Woody CAR can be spec with different optional equipment and color variations.
Woody CAR Base Spec
This is perfect entry level configuration for anyone who wishes to customize their Woody CAR. It is blank canvas ready for any wild idea you can think of.
Woody CAR Base Spec
Woody CAR with transparent protection or color combination
Want better protection against the elements and/or custom look with different color options? Select from several different color options and combinations.
If you have color combination in mind tell us and we will do our best to make your request come true (within ultimate full spec option package).
Woody CAR with protective coat
 Woody CAR Light package
Fancy some bright highlights on your cool ride? Spec your Woody CAR with optional Light package.
This option includes LED headlights and taillights, dashboard switch and indication light. (Package only allowable with transparent protection or color combination)
Headlights assembly
Taillights assembly
Woody CAR Upholstered Seat
Upgrade seat with high quality leatherette upholstered seat base and back support. Available in standard space black color.
More color options available in ultimate full spec option package. (Package only allowable with transparent protection or color combination)
Leatherette upholstery seat
Ultimate Full Spec Option Package
Standard Woody CAR with its options not unique enough for you? You have head full of ideas bud do not have time or know-how to realize them?
Tell us your wishes and we will try to make anything possible.
Woody CAR can be completely unique
What is included?
Each Woody CAR reward includes:
Woody CAR specified in reward
Swappable battery with 12V/ 12Ah capacity
Charger 12V 1A with indicator light, plug type A, C or G (your specified type option)
User manual with instructions
After campaign end, we will send order form with further instruction to e-mail address associated with your Kickstarter Account. In this form we will also collect your delivery address. 
Memories recall me of “my first toy car” given to me by my father. Even today, the feelings of joy and happiness are vivid.
Now I am also the father of two children, to whom I wanted to give just the same experience as I had as a child. In my search for an original and slightly different model from the flood of cheap plastic copies, I noticed that nowhere can you get a ride-on car made of wood. All that was available was cheap plastic copies of cars. 
The idea then developed on its own. I wanted to create a wooden children’s car. With my experience and technical knowledge, I studied the possibility of making such a product and together with my colleagues implemented ideas and perfected it. 
Woody was born – THE FIRST ELECTRIC RIDE-ON CAR FOR CHILDREN MADE OF WOOD. 
Matevž Reberčnik, creator of Woody CAR

How it  all started?
Story of project Woody starts more than one year ago. First designs were created several months later, and first fully functional prototype was bringing joy to kids in spring. 
With proof of concept complete we got overwhelming support and praise from our peers. This pushed us to develop this idea into something more than just side project.
We learned from first prototype, greatly improved design in every way with safety and reliability at the top of our priorities. 
We sourced only the best, well proven components and materials, performed daily real-world tests and carried out laboratory tests to confirm our product meets or exceeds EU directives and harmonized standards for toys.
 Still, we never stop improving. By the time we send you rewards we plan to make many more improvements, get our product tested by independent lab and upgrade our workshop machinery and knowledge - all in the name off better, safer product. 
From one-off experiment, to side project, to complete Kickstarter product with message for better future.
Matevž
Matevž is where it all started. With degree in mechatronics engineering, many years in e-mobility sector and hands on person from early age this project is his personal passion and challenge. 
Innovator and car enthusiast coming from one of the greenest countries in the world where wood-craft culture is rooted in its people it is no surprise Woody CAR was created here. 
Like all his projects Woody CAR is constant work in progress, constantly finding ways to improve existing design as he prides himself as perfectionist who wants to create the best possible creation each time.
“When you become parent and you try to spend as much time as possible with your children you realize that time will not last forever. Years fly by and you want to make each moment count; no really, read that again and let it sink in. I choose toys with educational value, not just physical but also mental, to help develop motor skills and real-world learning experience. And why limit fun only to young ones, Woody is made to bring fun, joy and pride to all.”

But this project could not be realized by only one person. 
Jaka
Jaka is one of the first supporters and part of this story from its beginning. With many successful business ventures under its name it provides valuable support to this project. 
Andrej
Andrej is seasoned master carpenter with many years of craftsmanship experience. His resume includes many unique, hand crafted wooden products under his own brand name.
Woody CAR team
We all share common vision - to offer the world environmentally friendly alternative to plastic ride-on vehicles. We take pride in what we do or create, and we strive to continuously better ourselves and our products.
Know someone who would love Woody CAR? Connect with us and help spread the word to your friends! We need your support and suggestions to keep improving our products and make Woody CAR even more perfect!
Click to download press release kit :)
First time using Kickstarter to get something exiting? Not sure how Kickstarter crowdfunding works? Let us help you with some quick basic facts regarding our project.
How Kickstarter works?
Kickstarter is crowdfunding site used as launchpad for companies or individuals to raise funds for their ideas to become reality. This could be used for development, production or just to prove market viability of the product.
What happens if you back the project (pledge)?
When you back a project you contribute funds to overall goal of making product a reality. For this you are rewarded with exclusive discounts, early deliveries and other exiting rewards that depend on pledged amount. In our case, backers can get fully functional final product with discounted prices before they are available anywhere else and additional individual perks. Sooner you pledge, sooner you get accesses to excusive content, project updates and important milestones.
How to back this project and collect rewards?
To back our project, select reward you want to receive and amount you want pledge. You will select your shipping country and finally set up your payment. Remember, in case funding goal is not achieved your pledged funds are not collected, so ether you get your reward, or you get your money back!
After successfully funding campaign we will send order form with further instruction to e-mail address associated with your Kickstarter Account. In this form we will also collect your delivery address.
When are rewards delivered?
Predicted delivery dates are listed with each reward type. Generally, our delivery timetable plans for first units to be delivered to customers by the end of November, while other rewards will be delivered in first months of 2021. Please note that this are our best estimates, delivery dates can differ from country to country and because of production delays. 
SHIPPING & WARRANTY
Does Woody CAR have a warranty?
Yes. Woody CAR comes with standard 1-year warranty on all parts and battery. We want our customers to have confidence in our product and service. Termes and conditions of warranty are listed in User manual.
How long is shipping time to my destination?
EU based addresses can expect deliveries in 14 days after dispatch. Non-EU based addresses will be shipped via Express Air cargo freight. Delivery times can vary substantially form destination to destination, but should be delivered within 14 days after dispatch 
Are there VAT or other fees related to shipping?
No. We cover VAT and other fees based on current legislation in country of origin (Slovenia). What we send you is a gift/reward for your donation, so there should be no import fees, but in some cases anchorites can still circumvent this, so we can't take any responsibility if there are additional fees for addresses outside EU. After delivery we will send invoice to your provided e-mail address.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Main purpose of our Kickstarter project is to see if you, potential likeminded backers have same vision as we have. With this project we want to unlock affordable alternative to plastic ride on vehicles, not just for small select group of people but for everyone, this is our goal. 
To achieve this, we of course need confirmation from you, our backers, that you want us to make this happen. In turn, we can confidently order larger quantities of materials used in creating Woody CAR, we can negotiate better prices, lower shipping costs, constantly improve our product, all for you, our customers and for our environment. If our campaign is not successful, we will be very limited in production quantities, price and shipping option.

With your funding we will also be able to make product safer thru harmonized standard testing by independent testing laboratories. We want to make sure these tests are performed before we send out the bulk of our rewards to ensure maximum safety for all potential users. These of course can be delayed if we need to adjust several things according to test results. 

With more than 250+ individual parts needed to make each Woody CAR there can be delays in manufacturing due to complications in part deliveries and supplier manufacturing. We do take these possible delays into account with our reward fulfillment timetable and set our initial production goals very low for this reason.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Still ... But Active
Hello, my name is Kaja. I am a visual artist, designer and illustrator originally from Slovenia but currently living in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.
It occured this spring that we all had to stay inside and go within, for the “outside” ceased to exist. And it lasted longer than I would have imagined.
Vrksasana - Tree Pose.

I used to go to yoga classes. As free movement outdoors and physical gatherings became impossible, me and a few classmates started yoga classes online. I was a bit sceptic in the beginning for I believe in the energy of the physical presence but soon understood that these virtual moments were one of those that were saving my days.
My yoga teacher started working intensely on social media and asked me whether I would be interested  in drawing yoga poses in order to enrich and add value to her video explanations of each one of them. I have been thinking of drawing yoga poses for a long time but it seems like the time had to get ripe and here it was. I can’t really move but I need to stay active. There is so much fear all around so I need to breathe consciously. The trick is to keep breathing. Practising and drawing yoga poses are all about what I mentioned before.
The trick is to keep breathing.
So I started drawing. The more I drew, the more it all made sense. The illustrations I was creating had a surprisingly strong impact: I percieved them as embodiments of pure stillness - active stillness - very conscious active stillness made of colourful lights; merging of spirit and matter. As my collection of “illustrated yoga” grew and with it my enthusiasm to do more I felt it is time for the next step: sharing it with the world.
Original drawings, aquarelle markers.
Virabhadrasana - Warrior II Pose.
Direction and Path 
Firstly - with your most kind help - I would like to produce a limited edition of high quality art prints. (I am very much tempted to apply my yoga series drawings onto unique pieces of clothing on the next stage.) Each art print featuring a calmly up-lifting, vividly vibrant, strongly energetic illustration is a reminder about what truly matters. It is very simple and extremely hard at the same time - it is finding one’s peace by merging spirit and matter.
And that’s what my project is all about. Your support will help me make it alive.
Win - Win
As a thank-you gift for supporting my creative process and my project you could choose between a hand-signed and dated postcard from the drawing series Active Stillness,
Vrishchikasana - Scorpion Pose // Parivrtta Janu Sirsasana - Revolved Head-of-the-Knee Pose // Utthita Trikonasana - Extended Triangle Pose // Adho Mukha Svanasana - Downward-Facing Dog Pose // Tittibhasana - Firefly Pose // Urdhva Padmasana - Upward Lotus Pose (from top to bottom, from left to right)
 ... a signed, limited edition unique piece of clothing featuring one of my illustrations from the drawing series Active Stillness,
Vrksasana - Tree Pose // Padmasana - Lotus Pose
... or a hand-signed, numbered and dated limited edition high quality art print from the drawing series Active Stillness.
Padangusthasana - Big Toe Pose
Virabhadrasana - Warrior II Pose
Padmasana - Lotus Pose
Adho Mukha Svanasana - Downward-Facing Dog Pose
Vrksasana - Tree Pose

Next step
I attend to create a 2021 calendar, full of graceful yoga poses. It is just a hint and a trigger. Preorders with special discount will be available 30 days before the calendar's release date.
Titibasana - Firefly Pose
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As it goes for all the work-in-progress projects, there is always a slight feeling of uncertainty included.
Behind every project there is a creative human being and as it is well known - we, humans, are not flawless. 
My challenge is to make people believe in what I am presenting, support my project and help me expand it.
All in all - I will do my best to make my project gradually grow and fluidly flow.

Navasana is a compact pose that requires you to draw everything toward your center: The abdomen moves toward the spine, the spine moves forward to support the front of the trunk, the shoulder blades move down and in toward the chest, while the chest spreads, and the arms and legs stay firm. The integration of all of your body parts in Full Boat Pose will leave you feeling strong and supple as well as mentally and emotionally steady.
It can build strength all the way to the core of your very being.
Thank you, all, wholeheartedly.

Savasana might look like a nap at the end of your yoga practice. But it’s actually a fully conscious pose aimed at being awake, yet completely relaxed.

campaign.story:
March on the Drina is a strategic area control war game which will take you back in time to World War I, a great struggle between the world’s most powerful nations. The game covers the Balkan Peninsula theater where one small country, The Kingdom of Serbia, was invaded by three fierce Empires, Germany, Austro-Hungary and Bulgaria.
If you want to sign up for our newsletter, please visit  March on the Drina and leave your email. Thank you!
March on the Drina began development in 2013 as the centennial anniversary of World War I approached. We wanted to make a game about the lesser known theater of WWI – The Balkan Peninsula Theater.  Without further ado, we invite you now to enjoy experiencing historically grounded components, a taste for the exciting gameplay, and the immersion into the battlefront of the Balkan Peninsula.
For easier maneuvering we used magnetic tokens.
March on the Drina is a game for 2-4 players ages 14+. The game duration is from 120 to 180 minutes. Each player controls one of the powers in conflict: Serbia, Germany, Austro-Hungary or Bulgaria. 
The setting from July 1914 to December 1918 is divided in 14 periods, where each period is described in one Calendar Card. Each Calendar Card also brings some effect to the game, so by using Calendar Cards, you will also learn highlights about the most important events of World War I.  
Each power has four types of units: Infantry, Cavalry, Artillery and Generals. All units have their attacking and defending values used to resolve combat.
When all Calendar Cards are used, the game ends. In order to win, Central powers (Germany, Austro-Hungary and Bulgaria) work together and they must occupy all Serbian cities and hold them for one round. If Serbia wants to win, it must liberate all its cities and hold them for one round. If the game ends after 14 periods and neither side completes its goal, the winner is the side who controls most Serbian cities.
Before players place their units on the Game Board, each side takes one mini map where, without knowledge of the other side, can mark a starting point for every unit under their control. In that way, the opponent has no idea where you will place your defense or from where the main attack will come.
Area within 3 fields from the field with a general is called General’s Area of Command and units within that area are under that general’s command. Each General has a special ability, which is written on his General’s card. General’s special ability is transferred on the units under his command.
Artillery have greater range of action than Infantry and Cavalry, so it can attack (fire upon) enemy units within a 3 field area.
In late October 1915, Germany, Austria-Hungary and Bulgaria launched a synchronised major offensive against Serbia. That same month, France and Britain landed four divisions at Salonika, but were unable to move north to help their outnumbered Serbian ally caught between the invading forces. 
If the enemy is pressing too hard, Serbian units may use the option of Retreat through Albania, which becomes available in January 1916.
If Serbian units stand on one of the five fields in northern Albania that are marked on the game board with dark gray color, it is automatically transferred to one of the dark gray color fields in northern Greece.
Cities have Military Capacity. The sum of the Military Capacity of the cities under player's control represents National Military Capacity and players can use Military Capacity Units to purchase reinforcements.
Watch our How to Play video
 Click here to download English Rulebook for March on the Drina 

If you would like our game in your store, please contact us on princepsgames@gmail.com. Thank you for understanding!

We will ship the games out to you as soon as possible and we won't be able to guarantee that any customs fees won't arise for you and it will all depend on your country's customs authorities. However, we will be able to offer US and EU-Friendly shipping if we can overfund to the right degree.
This is an estimate of the shipping costs which will be charged after the campaign, via pledge manager.
October 2020 - Campaign ends
November 2020 - Pledge Manager
December 2020 - Production starts
February 2021 - Shipping to Fulfillment partners
 April 2021 - Shipping to backers
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Creating, publishing and distributing a board game is not easy. There are many risks to consider, especially in this pandemic time, but we are doing and will continue to do everything in our power to make this a smooth and enjoyable experience for everyone.

We are determined to make this project a success for our backers, so we decided to start with our local manufacturer, Forsage Games from Belgrade, Serbia (creator of Tank Chess and Age of Dogfights WW1) because we believe in supporting our local business and they provide high quality components. With their reasonable pricing, we are able to set our funding goal low as $5350 and build up the quality of our components through stretch goals. 

As you can see, the initial design includes 11x11 inches box, three 1/2 folded part game board, 300gsm paper markers, cardboard insert and gray board tokens and chits. This would be the case if we get from 50 to 350 backers. 

If more people back our game, then we will be able to offer more quality materials to our backers. This will include a 1/6 foldable game board, plastic tray, metal coins and more, depending of the stretch goal achieved.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
From $79 for Kickstarter backers.
We're Freedrum and this is the most affordable way to learn and play the drums anytime, anywhere. By pledging from just $79 (Kickstarter discount) we'll give you everything you need to get started:
1. Our new complete virtual drum kit that's silent and portable.
2. A 3 month subscription to our app (iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows) that will teach you to play and much more.
We love playing the drums but they're large, loud, and expensive. That's why we've created an instrument that's silent, portable, and significantly more affordable.
Our solution is a complete hardware and software subscription service that will give you everything you need to start playing the drums.
This tightly integrated relationship between instrument and app will transform the way that you practice and give you deeper insights into your improvements.

LEARN TO PLAY ALONG TO MUSIC
PLAY

Our app takes learning to a new level of fun. We will include a catalog of licensed music so that you can learn to play along with your favourite songs. Our software will show you what you should play and how well you are playing it.
TRACK YOUR PROGRESS 
The activity analysis in our app removes the guesswork from tracking your progress. We'll summarise the following data in chronological order from each of your practice sessions so that it's easy to find and read:
Play time: how long did you play for and when
  Intensity: did you take it easy or did you thrash it?
  Your set list: songs you played along to
  Recordings: listen back to your recorded practice sessions
  Accuracy: how accurate you are with tempo, hitting the right drums, and muscle memory.
  Notes: annotate your practice sessions to jog your memory later on
  SHARE YOUR RECORDINGS 
 You'll have so much fun improving your skills that you won't be able to keep it to yourself. We're making recording the drums easier than ever before. Simply share your recordings with the Freedrum community in a few clicks.
OUTPUT MIDI TO ANY DAW
Once you’re ready to take your drumming into production, output MIDI from our app to your favourite Digital Audio Workstation such as GarageBand, Ableton, and Pro Tools. You’ll be able to remap the MIDI so that you can:
Trigger different notes
  Set continuous controller values
  Define fixed velocities
 
NEVER STOP LEARNING
Even the pro's never stop learning. Our service will grow with your confidence level and keep challenging you to be better. We'll recommend exercises that encourage improvement as well as retention of learned skills.
HAPTIC FEEDBACK 
PLAY

Nothing is going to replace the feeling of playing behind an acoustic drum kit but our new virtual drum kit will bring you closer. Haptic feedback (similar to what you feel with a game console controller) creates a unique sensation based on which drum you hit and how hard. We’ve done this by recreating the vibrations you feel when playing an acoustic kit.
HEEL UP

One of the most requested features from our customers is the ability to play the bass pedal with your heel up: increasing your speed and comfort. This will work for single bass, double bass, and the hi-hat.
CUSTOM GRIP STYLES 
 In our app you will be able to select your preferred drumstick grip style for both left and right-handed playing: intelligently re-calibrating the drumstick sensors to meet the ergonomic grip of your choice.
Packages and Upfront Cost
It's our mission to make Freedrum compatible with as many devices as possible. As our name suggests, you should be free to use our product in a way that suits you best. Please refer to our FAQ for a full list of supported devices. 
Since Freedrum is using interactive audio, Bluetooth headphones and speakers have an inherent latency that makes it difficult to play. Please refer to our FAQ page for more information.
Thanks to you, the community, our first virtual drum kit reached over 400% of the Kickstarter goal and we delivered our rewards, on time, 9 months later. Since 2017 we've shipped 15 000 units globally and we've listened to all of your feedback. We're back, four years later to ask for your help once more. Pledge to our project today and help us create the future of drumming for all.

OUR TEAM
Need assets for press or social media? Here is the PRESS KIT LINK.
 This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our second Kickstarter campaign (the first one we delivered on time) and we have decades of experience between us in delivering hardware and software products to the market. Although we are confident in our ability to ship our products to you within the estimated timeframe, unforeseen issues resulting from the pandemic and recession may occur.

In this campaign we are committed to providing you with rich content to help you learn to play along to your favourite music. This will involve licensing music libraries - something that we have limited experience in. That being said, we have already begun discussions with major record labels and we're confident in saying that we will deliver on this promise.

Having backed multiple campaigns between ourselves personally, we know how important updates are. Our mission is to keep you in the loop as we go. Whether it's good news or bad, we'll be in touch!

Thanks so much for your time and we hope to see you join our Freedrum community!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey Freedrummers!
Thank you so much for your support and feedback last month.
With Freedrum 2 We are developing a far more advanced technology than anything created for virtual drumming before. For this reason, we are limited in what we can share publicly just yet. We think you will be excited about what's coming next.

Hey Freedrummers!
Thank you so much for liking and commenting on our last post. Your feedback is very important to us in the development of Freedrum 2. It also helps us get a better understanding of what you would like to see in updates in the future.
This month's update will look a little bit different. We will share a smaller update with you today and be back in two weeks to give you another update. The reason for this is that there is so much going on within developing Freedrum 2, but we are limited to what we can share with you quite yet.

Thank you all so much for the amazing and positive feedback we received on our last update! We are so happy to see you all as excited for Freedrum 2 as we are!

What’s new?
It’s been a busy month (like always) in the Freedrum team. We have started to engage with suppliers for production of Freedrum 2 and so far it’s going well! The R&D team is working on new renderings (digital photographs) that we hopefully will be able to share with you next month!

Hey Freedrummers!
Thank you all for showing so much love for our previous post about the new employees in the R&D team! We are really proud of our team and we are so grateful to have these passionate people contributing to the development of Freedrum 2.

Happy New Year Freedrummers!
We hope you all had a kick-ass start to the new year! This year is big. This is the year where Freedrum 2 is going to be launched and we are so excited!

  Now the time has come to really get into the hardware. After many months of interviewing dozens of people, we have our team! Some of them started late last year, some of them started at the beginning of 2021. Every single person is hired to give you the best product possible. We want to introduce the new team members of the RnD team to you so you can get a better understanding of what they are working with, developing and creating that's going to make Freedrum 2 the best product possible.

Hey Freedrummers!
Creating something from scratch is both exciting and challenging. The beauty in creating the Freedrum 2 is that we get to do it together with all of you!

updates.update_userinfo: Update on app development and growing team!
updates.update_content:
Hey Freedrummers!

Wow! We are loving all the song recommendations! We knew our backers would have great taste in music!

The Holidays are approaching and we know you won't be unwrapping your Freedrum 2 this year. But! We are getting closer and closer to August 2021 and before you know it, you will have a pair of Freedrum 2 in your hands!

comments.content: Hmm, after seeing a comment below I started wondering, If I did not select the pledge level for Midi Output, it essentially becomes useless if I don't keep paying a subscription? Also it seem the midi output only works through the app? What if I for example would like to use it on a computer with custom software without the app will this not be possible? For example with Soundtrap?
Just came across aerodrum is this a copying of it 🤔
Meant copy

Nope, they are different, Aerodrums uses motion capture techniques. In fact, there is another project called Senstroke that could look even more similar to freedrum. Each of them follows a different approach with its pros and cons. Afaik, freedrum is the only one that allows you to play air drums, meaning that you can play on the go just with the sensors and your mobile device. I can't speak about the accuracy or feeling of each system because I just have tested freedrum.

The answer seems to be no. A bit disappointing not having a simple response to this question, even if the creators feel it is already answered by their posts. Not a lot of questions posted in the last 30 days.

I hope creators will provide some meaningful updates soon. Now that the project’s funded, it’s a good chance for them to show us what they really care about in this project.

Yes, you need to get the $199 Kickstarter Exclusive. Once the campaign ends you will only(!!) be able to get MIDI output with a subscription.
It doesn't need to be $99/2y, but some exclusive discounts for backers would be appreciated. :)

I'm not a drummer, and I believe Freedrum 2 could be a great opportunity for me to learn the basics of drumming without buying an acoustic or electronic drum set, considering that I've not enough space at the moment. But, as a backer (and moreover without the possibility to see your product in action before paying for it) it' really crucial that I will be able to use your product even if I stop to pay monthly fees. I mean, not the complete stuff, but at least we should be able to use Freedrum to drum and exercise, forever and without limitations, simply because we are investing our money and time in something that still doesn't exist and probably won't exist without us. Other stuff could be behind a paywall, for sure (such as drum over licensed songs) and by the way your rewards are very generous on the offered months of subscriptions, but the possibility to simply use the product must be forever. Please consider this, many of us (both beginners and professionals) are asking for this.
Can the monthly subscription be paused/restarted at any time?
Thanks. I meant what will the annual subscription price be later on if we renew?
Price for the subscription will be 14,99$/month, 10$/month if you subscribe annually
2) If your team ends support for the proposed subscription model, can you commit to being willing and able to implement end of life support by unlocking the full feature set for users?

I've been reading through the FAQ for FD1 and it says FD1 uses MIDI over Bluetooth so basically it can be connected to any device and then start reading the midi signals that follow the Bluetooth LE MIDI standard. I'm really curious about this. You mentioned the lifetime midi access will offer the same experience as FD1. In the FAQ of FD1 it says: "Freedrum Sensors use MIDI over Bluetooth to work with the vast majority of music software other than our own personal app". I guess this changes a bit for FD2 as I understand MIDI is now tied to the app, which makes FD2 a more closed product (in terms of processing the FD2 device signals out of the app) than FD1. Am I right or lifetime midi will work as in FD1?
Or are they tied with the hardware (the sticks) meaning that when I will play with one set I will have subscription available and when I play with the other set only MIDI??

Past that and no. 15? heck no! Just not happening. It's like a Sirius subscription. They want 30ish, I pay 5 or nothing. They take 5. Please set up a tiered subscription before the KS ends. I'm happy to give you 25ish/yr to tinker. I'm not sure what you mean by kit customization. If you mean I can't pick different drums to play without paying you, then again, NO! Charge more for the hardware and let me use it. Try to nickel and dime me, and you get nothing. Charge me something fair (fair to me), and you can collect for quite a while. But having to pay by the month for basic functionality will get very irritating after a while. Charge me what you want up front and you'll get my money. Try to charge me forever and you'll get nothing but irritation.

My feeling is that this will cost you a lot of Customer.

It does not cost 15/m for an app. The hardware costs 49 and I would pay another 49 for just the midi functionality, coz you know it's that important, and inexpensive but I don't want to pay 15/m for an app, forever.

Marcus, this is a shortcoming from the creator. For sure they could offer multi packs, but they have omitted that option. Why make it easy to buy their product when you can make it hard?

campaign.story:
Finding a running partner who can challenge you and commit to your training regimen is the key to maximizing your workouts — but it’s near impossible!
Train harder with a running partner anytime and anywhere.
The Ghost Pacer is the next-generation outdoor workout. The world's first set of mixed-reality glasses projects a hologram you can race against outdoors in real-time! Get
Built FOR runners BY runners, Ghost Pacer is the on-demand workout partner that will give you the competitive edge you need to crush your goals!
Running is inspiring. It’s challenging. It’s motivating. But it can be frustrating when you pour hours, days and weeks into workouts… only to not see any improvement.
Running with a partner can unlock each workout’s full potential.
But it can be hard — especially now — to find that stronger partner who can push you without being too fast and demotivating. And organizing long-term regular workouts with them can be nearly impossible!
Tired of having to keep track of time in your head or relying on someone to try to record precise lap times? Your time and energy should be spent on beating those records, not trying to keep track of them.

                 The Ghost Pacer is always ready to join you on a run. To push your pace. To push you past your limits. And push you to perform at your best!
Not only does the Ghost Pacer provide an HD display of your time, speed, and distance among other things, but all you have to do is put it on and run.
With a pinpoint GPS, a state of the art accelerometer, and compatibility with smartwatches, all your data can be consolidated and easily accessible with the Ghost Pacer App, you can train on your own time with no worries.
Just set up your avatar quickly, and try to catch up with them as you run on your route. The faster you go, the closer you’ll get to them!
Ready? Go!
Forget about looking down at your smartwatch, or taking out your phone. The sleek and lightweight Ghost Pacer is designed to fully adapt to your running experience so that you forget it’s there. 
The Ghost Pacer shows you your live running stats without needing to keep your eyes off of the prize. A quick momentary focus of the eye brings them into view instantly, without having to tilt your head or look away from what’s ahead of you.
And with its built-in GPS tracking, you’ll never run off course — whether you’re running alongside your avatar, or following the onscreen directions.
Immerse yourself in your running experience — the Ghost Pacer is so light that you won’t even realize it’s there. At just 90 grams (~3oz), the Ghost Pacer is the only mixed-reality headset in the world that is light enough to wear while running.
You’ll appreciate the lightness even on your longer ultra-marathons, as the Ghost Pacer can keep you going for up to 6 hours.
Shaped like a streamlined pair of sports sunglasses, only you will experience the Ghost Pacer as you run past your competition and leave them in the dust!
You no longer have to wait for the Perfect Workout Partner!
Keep it simple with a constant target pace. Or pull up an old workout from the app and run against your own varying pace. You can even run against your friends or anyone sharing runs on Strava!
The Ghost Pacer never quits! With 6 hours of battery life, your running partner will consistently maintain the perfect pace. 
Get immediate visual feedback when you run as The Ghost Pacer helps you adjust your speed to get back on track. As you slow down, Ghost Pacer will gain distance — an awakening that drive to push harder!

By helping you keep on pace, you’ll maximize the value of each run and improve results. Run after run. And with Ghost Pacer by your side, it will be that much easier to chase down your goals. One step at a time. 
Ever wonder how you would pair against Usain Bolt in the 100 meter?
Expand your running horizons and set goals based on your favorite runners or classic olympic athletes. From sprints to ultra marathons, harness the power of Strava to get access to an endless library of real runs from across the globe.
See how you compare to the runners in your area!
Use the Vimazi RunCrush app together with the Ghost Pacer Pro app to see daily suggested workouts and routes tailored specifically to your fitness profile and goals!

Developed at Vimazi with the guidance of world-class, professional running coaches, the Ghost Pacer Pro avatar is calibrated to dynamically change its pace along your route to help you optimize your workout and improve consistently over time.
The more you run with the Ultimate Running Partner, the better it learns your habits and paves your road to victory! 
A LOT of factors go into your performance, and it’s not always easy to know when to push harder or pull back.
That’s why, with the Ghost Pacer Pro, you will be able to connect your glasses with the heart rate sensors in most popular smartwatches! The Advanced Ghost Pacer Pro app will fine-tune your training sessions to keep you in the optimal zone.
 The Ghost Pacer Pro avatar will change its speed in real-time to ensure your heart rate and exertion levels are within optimal ranges every step of the way!
Please note, however, that you do NOT need a smartwatch to be able to use the Ghost Pacer Pro — only to access this particular feature. Please see our FAQ section for the full list of compatible watches.
Designing a useful mixed reality experience and fitting it into a streamlined pair of glasses that you can comfortably wear while running was not easy.
Years went into developing and compressing what started as 5 pounds of hardware and optics into a sleek pair of glasses that wouldn’t weigh you down — but lift you up.

Today, after thousands of hours of work, the results speak for themselves — the Ghost Pacer remains the only headset in the world with its mixed reality capabilities that is still light enough to wear while running.
The Ghost Pacer relies on 3 major features to bring your 3D running companion to life:
How to get Rewards
The summer of 2017 was frustrating. By August, despite running almost every day for three months, I was no faster than I was at the beginning of the summer. I realized that what I needed was the competitive edge I got from racing alongside one of my faster friends. But with everyone busy all the time, we could never quite get our schedules to line up.
After yet another subpar workout, I had a thought- what if we could somehow build the ultimate training partner? One that I could train with on my schedule that would still help me get the competitive benefits of training with a partner. And that’s how the idea of the Ghost Pacer was born- a pair of glasses that project a holographic training partner that runners could run with anywhere, at any time. Not only would it improve my time, it would make each workout that much more effective.
At every step of the way, we have been advised by experts in both running and technology, helping ensure that we deliver the best product possible. And now, three years and countless solder burns later, we are ready to launch on Kickstarter and bring the Ghost Pacer to the world. Please back us today, and get the most effective and reliable workout partner the world has ever seen.
- AR Bhatti (CEO of Ghost Pacer)
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As we prepare to deliver the Ghost Pacer, we are continuing to work very closely with our advisors who have delivered products like the Hololens and Emotiv headset. They are guiding us down the process of getting our product into your hands as well as ensuring transparency along the way should any challenges arise.
Manufacturing: We are working with suppliers to ensure a strong pipeline of components and are optimizing our BOM for manufacturing efficiency. However, unpredictable effects from the COVID-19 pandemic may cause delays in the manufacturing process outside of our control. We have worked to mitigate this risk by lining up manufacturers ahead of time and working with our advisors who have already brought multiple hardware products to market.
Shipping: We have already mapped out the shipping, warehousing, and distribution and will work with reputable global shipping providers and 3PL services to optimize the time from factory to mailbox. Again, we will do our best to mitigate any unpredicted delays in real time and communicate with you should these occur.
Certifications: We are planning to finalize FCC and CE certifications soon. We have worked to keep our product within proper parameters such that we do not anticipate this being a problem.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Ghost Pacers 👋
After an intense whirlwind of a month, we can’t begin to describe how grateful we are to have over 800 people interested in getting their very own Ghost Pacer! 🔥🔥
This small dream of ours will now become a reality, and help runners everywhere train better — and you have a head start.

Hey Ghost Pacer family,
You know that feeling the day of a race?
Excitement. Butterflies. The surge of energy coursing through your veins…
Even though we started this race last week, that feeling is with us every morning. As we wake and find that even more of you have joined us on this mission to make the Ghost Pacer a reality!

For everyone who has already supported us so far - thank you for getting us past the $25,000 mark. We still have a long way to go to be able to bring the Ghost Pacer to you in the quickest timeline possible and with additional awesome features! The more we are able to raise, the more amazing features we will be able to incorporate into the Ghost Pacer. To get there, we still need as many people as possible to back our campaign.

updates.update_userinfo: Thank You For Your Continued Support!
updates.update_content: We hit our funding goal in less than one hour! Thank you so much for being one of Ghost Pacer's earliest backers. We are on our way to hit our stretch goal that will unlock the Avatar Expansion Pack, where you will get access to 10 more avatars to race against! Please help us out by spreading the word about the Ghost Pacer.

campaign.story:
$50k STRETCH GOAL - 7.9.20
Thank you: in under a week, we hit our initial goal of $30,000. The generosity of our backers has encouraged us that many share our values and vision, and want to help us transform the justice system through free technology. So, we are setting a stretch goal of $50,000. Prisons are still on lockdown due to COVID-19. Your contributions will fund free letters for 4,000 families over the next three months. Thank you for your support.
What is Ameelio?  
Ameelio is a nonprofit technology company committed to transforming prison communications. Through free letters, postcards, and video calling, we're supporting meaningful connection between incarcerated people and their loved ones outside. Our vision is to disrupt the captive prison telecommunications industry, decouple incarceration and profit, and reduce recidivism. 

As of May 15, 2019, Ameelio Inc, EIN 84-1800611 is a registered nonprofit 501(c)(3) organization based in Connecticut, USA. ALL DONATIONS ARE TAX DEDUCTIBLE.
 Ameelio’s work intersects the two issues most central to the public consciousness right now: COVID-19 and criminal justice reform. Prisons are on lockdown to stop the spread of COVID-19, and incarcerated people are more isolated than ever. 95% of Americans support criminal justice reform. Supporting human connection to reduce recidivism is the first step towards a more rehabilitative justice system. We are an innovative solution for this historic moment.
N.B. You don't need a Kickstarter account to support our work! You can donate anonymously as a guest. When you click "back this project", you'll see a split divided screen: "Create an Account" and "More Options." Under "More Options," choose "Make a pledge without creating an account. Continue as guest."
PROBLEM
The $1.2 billion prison communications industry generates obscene profits (51% margin for Securus, 2015) by charging extortionate prices to the incarcerated and their loved ones. Families report spending up to $500 a month to stay connected to their loved ones inside. A 15-minute phone call runs as steep as $25.
Why? Exclusive contracts leave prison telecommunications companies unchecked by competition: former FCC Commissioner Mignon Clyburn called the industry “the clearest, most glaring type of market failure I’ve ever seen as a regulator.” 



Poverty and incarceration are bound in a vicious cycle. Over 50% of incarcerated people had no income in the 8 years preceding their arrest; four years post-release, around 50% of formerly incarcerated people are still without income. Industries like these entrench this cycle. One in three families with incarcerated loved ones is forced into debt (by $13,000, on average) by the costs of maintaining contact.
This is a social and moral disaster.

SOLUTION
  We’re outcompeting profit-driven telecommunications providers with better, cheaper solutions that seek to serve, not exploit, the incarcerated and their loved ones.

LETTERS FOR FAMILIES
Through our web and mobile app, users can send free letters and photos to any incarcerated person in the U.S. criminal justice system. We’re removing financial barriers to contact between incarcerated people and their loved ones to build community and lift financial burdens from loved ones of the incarcerated. 

PLAY

Richard Watkins of Emerge CT, a New Haven based nonprofit, discussing the importance of receiving letters while incarcerated.

LETTERS FOR ORGANIZATIONS
  Closing the revolving door of recidivism requires coordinated reentry support. Letters for Organizations, a paid add-on to Letters, connects incarcerated people who are nearing their release dates with organizations providing support in finding employment, housing, healthcare, legal support, and more.
CONNECT: VIDEO CONFERENCING
The closest substitute for in-person contact, Ameelio’s video conferencing platform will connect incarcerated people with their loved ones, lawyers, educational and telehealth resources, and more — for free. We have secured our first partner facility. By 2021, we will have launched the nation’s first free prison video conferencing platform.
Maintaining contact with family members and loved ones during a period of incarceration is essential, especially now during the pandemic, and even more so for juvenile offenders… Video visits can help provide an important emotional connection, and sense of normalcy during these very unusual and trying times. 
—  Former CT Department of Corrections Commissioner, Rollin Cook

PLAY

IMPACT
Since our launch just three months ago, we’ve sent more than 22,000 letters to over 1,000 correctional facilities in the U.S. We have over 5,500 users in 49 states and 29 countries. Our growth has been completely organic. 
But our growth statistics cannot capture our impact. Countless users have reached out to thank us and describe Ameelio’s impact on their lives:
I can't tell you how much difference your organization has made for me and my loved one… my LO gets one 15min call per day... how can you keep a father-child relationship strong with that? it rips families apart... you have been able to help... it means a lot... thanks again.    — Steven
Thank u for everything it really helps cause money is so tight and I can’t afford stamps. I'm choosing stamps to talk to my husband or my heart meds that are expensive. I don't have insurance.     — Savannah
WHAT ARE YOU FUNDING?
100% of our revenue from this campaign will fund free letters for families impacted by incarceration. A pledge of just $100 will fund one family's letters to their incarcerated loved one for an entire year. By supporting our work, you're directly supporting families impacted by incarceration, and committing to building a more humane justice system.
WHO'S BEHIND AMEELIO? 
We're a team of over 50 engineers, students, and designers. Some of us have personal experience with the justice system. But most importantly, we're people who believe that everyone experiencing incarceration should be able to stay connected to their loved ones. 
Uzoma Orchingwa, Ameelio’s co-founder and CEO, is a P.D. Soros Fellow and student at the Yale Law School. His interest in criminal justice reform is rooted both in his childhood experiences, and in his desire to eliminate financial and social barriers that entrench cycles of poverty. He became passionate about the problem of prison telecommunications while pursuing his MPhil in Criminology as a Gates Scholar at the University of Cambridge. 
Gabriel Saruhashi, co-founder and CTO, is a senior at Yale College, where he studies Computer Science and Psychology. He has experience working as a Software Engineer at Facebook and Product Manager Zippi (YC S’19), and is passionate about building technology that serves populations historically overlooked by innovators.
PLAY



SUPPORTERS

PRESS
You can learn more about us on Tech Crunch, Fast Company, Business Insider, Trend Watching's Innovation of the Day, The Washington Post. 

Want to know where we're getting our stats? See our additional sources. 
Want to help us spread the word on social media? We'd really appreciate it! 
Instagram: https://bit.ly/38jOkBa 
Facebook: https://bit.ly/2Zq9lWL
Twitter: https://bit.ly/2VymtIg
LinkedIn: https://bit.ly/2YOCDz5
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We estimate that there are 11.5 million Americans (https://everysecond.fwd.us) with incarcerated loved ones who could benefit from our services. Our biggest challenge right now is to reach all possible users. COVID-19 has limited our range of outreach strategies, but we’ve made use of social media, local news sites, and referrals to spread the word about our work. So far, 100% of our growth has been organic, but we are considering advertising strategies to continue expanding our userbase.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
We are solving the problems of most personal and home care products that too often contain questionable ingredients and leave us no choice but to create massive packaging waste.
Meet EQUA CARE  

Most care products only contain 1/10 of active ingredients. All the rest is water that only adds up to the packaging volume and increases the carbon footprint during transport.   
This results in way too many single-use packaging units produced every year leaving massive amounts of waste staying in our landfills for 500 years or more.
With EQUA CARE products, you create 30 times less single-use plastic waste by refilling your dispenser over and over again.  
* for 20 used bottles
In collaboration with a cosmetic scientist, we developed a line of liquid-free body and home care products. EQUA CARE is refined to its essence and provides you the only 1/10 of active ingredients you actually need.  
At home, add tap water to the powder formula, give it a good shake, and your liquid soap is ready to use. When it's empty, simply refill your dispenser.
Not only sensitive skins deserve to be in contact with the highest quality ingredients. All skins do. Rather than using artificial ingredients, we believe in all-natural premium components and we make sure to source all of our ingredients from thrusted partners, so you know that you are supporting businesses that are doing good. 
Carefully-sourced ingredients 
Dispenser made from recycled materials
EQUA CARE dispensers are refillable and designed to last a lifetime. They are made of recycled single-use plastic bottles waste, so no new plastic is being produced in the process.         
30X less plastic waste
Besides receiving a beautiful dispenser, you also get EQUA CARE powder formula doses to refill your dispenser without needing to buy a new product whenever it’s empty. Refill doses come in a minimal packaging that is fully recyclable too.    
EQUA CARE has been designed with the full product life-cycle in mind, from the production, transport, user experience, and the impact that it creates once the product is being disposed of.  
THANK YOU
Team work really makes the dream work. This campaign has been in the making for more than a year and I’d wish to credit all people who have been a big part of this journey:
EQUA team: Co-founder Stella Korošec; Project managers Luka Verdnik, Tina Svetek, Maja Repotočnik; Finance Vida Miklavec, Eva Colnarič; Copywriting and concept Marine Rot; Art direction Anja Sečnik; Graphic design Veronika Brezovnik and Petra Ogrin; Marketing and advertising Maja Vejnović; Social media: Katja Grubiša, Tjaša Džafić, Tina Lapajne, Tina Stančič and Alja Perne; Chief business development Helena Felc Žveplan; Support team: Andrea Negoescu, Martina Humar, Simon Jamšek, Anže Gliha.
Video direction: Luka Stanovnik; DOP: Sašo Stih; Additional video material: Taja Košir Popovič; Photographer: Jaka Birsa.
You guys are the best!
Anže Miklavec, CEO 
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Over the last 10 years, we have been crafting sustainable water bottles and sold over 3 million of them to people worldwide. On this journey, we have learned a lot and we are still continuously improving the products we make. Since day one, we’ve taken the pledge to build our company in an environmentally-friendly way.

Our products are hand-assembled and shipped from our headquarters, in the heart of Europe, and respond to the highest codes of ethics.

This is our second Kickstarter campaign for EQUA team and we're proud to say that all 2,772 backers from the first campaign were successfully delivered. Our team is now even bigger and stronger, and we’re ready to support your sustainable lifestyle further.


Production & delivery

We have already completed an extensive pilot run for several months now, testing EQUA CARE products. As soon as we are funded, we will be able to kick-off the production and ship it to our backers.

The formulas have been carefully developed and are approved by a certified cosmetic scientist. The dispenser’s design and powder refills have already been refined and are ready to go. We have mapped out the critical path and have made all necessary precautions to ensure we can scale production if we surpass our goal.

We are very confident in our timeline, but it's our core belief to never settle for a mediocre product, so we won't be compromising on the quality in order to save time.

Should any production challenges or processing delays arise in terms of production or delivery, we promise to keep you updated every step of the way and deliver you the best quality product as soon as possible.

Guaranteed delivery
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
EQUA CARE dispensers are refillable and reusable over and over, designed to last a lifetime for a premium user-experience as well as sustainable for the environment.
Reusability and recyclability
Sustainability is at the core of EQUA CARE. Our body and home care products come in a bundle that includes a dispenser and powder refill doses that are both fully recyclable. An important fact of our product in terms of sustainability is that to avoid producing more plastic than it is already on our planet, we’ve chosen to manufacture our dispensers out of 100% recycled single-use plastic bottle waste.
Sustainable materials
EQUA CARE has been designed in a sustainable way with the full product life-cycle in mind, from the bottle production, packaging, and formula development. We chose recycled plastic as a long-term alternative solution to the glass material.

When researching the carbon footprint of different materials, we found out that recycled PET is the most efficient option for body and home care products, since no new materials need to be produced in the process. Our dispenser creates 4 times less carbon footprint than a glass bottle would from the production and transport. More about materials’ efficiency and their carbon footprint here: www.ecolizer.be

Another reason for not using glass is that it can break and therefore be unsafe, especially in the shower area.
Sustainable Distribution
Distribution is an entire part of EQUA CARE. The powder formula has a shelf life of 12 months which enables the user to buy the refills in bulk instead of purchasing single products whenever those are empty. All refills are delivered to you so you don’t have to drive to the store each time you empty a product.

updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
Yaaay, your orders are being shipped out! Soon you will be able to try out your new products.
We have done a major step towards EQUA CARE's mission to make the cleaning habits more natural and ecological!

Dear Backers,
Every good change in life comes with the challenge.
It is hard to believe that a single project can face with so many of them.
  Yesterday we began with distribution of EQUA CARE products. We were sooooo happy!

Dear backers and customers,
we appreciate all your orders and a fast feedback regarding our Kickstarter campaign survey. EQUA CARE team is working overtime to prepare and ship out all of your packages.
We have faced a lot of challenges during the development process and successfully overcome them. Life is full of surprises and the last possible surprise has crossed our path just a few days ago. The machine which we have selected and customized just for EQUA CARE powder packaging decided that it must be additionally modified before working perfectly.

Dear beloved backers,
we are now even closer with finalizing all of the EQUA CARE products as mentioned in our last update.
Please check your email inbox again for EQUA CARE SURVEY, which we have sent out to you last week and don’t forget to fill it in. You still have time till midnight tonight (CET).

Dear beloved backers, we are just “minutes” away with finalization of all of the EQUA CARE products. Please check your email inbox for EQUA CARE SURVEY, which we have sent out to you yesterday ;)
You will be able to select your favourite option for the package you backed up and also (if you want) to upgrade your package with different kinds of options. Please fill in the SURVEY and send back to us your most appreciated information in the next few days (till 20.01.2021 at latest)!

Yes! We have made it! We are so proud to announce the start of EQUA CARE production in our office in Ljubljana/Slovenia/Europe. All the customized machines, ingredients, and components are finally here, so our chief scientist Tina already started working really hard to deliver everything we have promised to you.

updates.update_userinfo: Preparation for production in the office
updates.update_content:
It is getting »hot« in our office. Although the Corona virus impact has nailed most of our team to home offices, the process of building our new EQUA CARE production room is in full swing. 
We set up new walls and a workbench, installed sinks, ventilation and prepared electricity sockets for all the machines. Everything is being done according to all the necessary regulations so we can start efficient and high quality production for you in house.

Dear backers,
As you already know, we have moved our production in house and with the final decisions made, our production process is established and all of our main components are ready and on the way to our company… We can’t wait to assemble everything and ship the products to their final destination - your doorstep!

Dear backers,
We are so happy to announce the cooperation with a really innovative and family-owned local company with more than 40 years of tradition in business - RUPAR plastics d.o.o. One of their active leaders is a 90-year old »grandma« that still comes to work every single day!   They have contacted us themselves because they believe and feel our project has a bright future!  They also applauded our decision to choose and make an R-PET (post-consumer resin) bottle!

Dear backers,
Still can't believe that we made it. Such an emotional week behind us.
We're super excited to announce some big news.

After a long discussion, we decided to move the production of EQUA CARE in-house! Having our very own EQUA CARE production facilities offers us many advantaged and the most reliability. So we're looking into having our very own production room, machines, packing room, and more. The whole team is already prepping the facility and w. Pictures of the progress will be available shortly.

campaign.story:
My name is Tom Schlegl. I am an urban planner, architect, illustrator, painter and conceptual artist.  
Artist Tom. Schlegl and his (Trump-like) Statue of Liberty (2019)
In the time of the Corona virus, my architectural work has completely stopped. The horrors around the world prompted me to start creating a fairy tale called The Invincible Seven. A fairy tale about a virus that changed the world. This story is now finished and it is here in front of you.
Starting point  
The world is increasingly dominated by pride, greed, lust, wrath, gluttony, envy and sloth. People are neglecting their ethical values. One day they wake up in the middle of deadly pandemic, from which there is no escape. The virus plunges humanity into a giant crisis…
Perhaps the virus is not a curse at all, but a gift from God? Because of it, many began to realize that they could be better than the vampiric system of capitalism. The virus opened the door to a new society for us. A society that works in solidarity and cooperation. A society that will take care of the common good, for all people and all nature, animate and inanimate.
What kind of society we will form is not a question of tomorrow, but a question of today.
The Invincible Seven tells the story of how the world can be different from the one in which our children are currently growing up.
Book Trailer 
At the top of the city of Babylon, seven giant chimneys rise into the dark sooty sky. Night and day, fire erupts from the chimneys, creating seven majestic pillars of smoke. Because they are so colorful, the townspeople of Babylon adore the mighty pillars of smoke.
One day there was a sudden flash and thunder. Annoyed by the pillars, mighty lightning strikes them. The lightning strike is so violent that little billows of smoke are separated from each chimney. Because the billows of smoke are incandesced by the lightning, they cannot return to the majestic smoke pillars.
In order not to extinguish too quickly, they merge into a small column of smoke. They want to see how far the mighty smoke pillars reach into the sky and what is burning at the top. So they start to climb…
What is up there and what happened will remain a mystery for now...
Illustrations
The book is entirely new in the field of illustrated books. For me, this book is like an architectural structure - by turning it, the reader will have a special experience. Its design reflects the author's architectural approach, where the illustrations blend into each other in an original way. You will enjoy looking at 17 inspiring handmade illustrations, which are a pleasure to study for parents and children alike.
Who is the book for? 
This educational story is suitable for children age of three and older. It is suitable for all those who want to change the world.
It might be a little scary for a toddler. But that is not a problem, because your toddler will grow up. The book will be waiting for him.
Technical data about the book
The book is 32 pages long. The format is 22.4 x 29.0 mm (8.81 "x 11.42"). It is printed on 170 g satin paper. It is a hardcover, sewn with thread. For now, it will be available in English and Slovenian. As a quality artwork, it is ideal as a gift.
Timeline
1st July 2020 - the start of the campaign on Kickstarter
1st August 2020 - in case of a successful campaign, the book goes to print immediately
20th August 2020 - the book is compressed
30th August 2020 - the book is sent to your address
About the author  

Tom Schlegl is an architect and urban planner. He has shown his talent for drawing and painting from an early age. Although he focused professionally on urbanism and architecture, fine arts remained his true love and with them he expresses his view of life and the world in which we live. In addition to occasional painting exhibitions and performances (for example the famous Trump statue that went viral in August 2019), the author has also been regularly publishing his critical caricatures in Zarja, Slovenia's leading weekly magazine.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are no risks to this project. The book is finished and ready for print. If I reach my goal on Kickstarter, the book goes to print immediately.

The only potential problem could be a possible new outbreak of the pandemic that could shut down post offices.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
