updates.update_content:
With 5 successful Kickstarter projects, Forsage Games is the most successful creator from Serbia and among the most successful in the region. In the past few years, we have often participated in various forums and seminars in which we shared our experiences. At one of such regional internet meetings, we met the creator from Slovenia, Darko Nikolovski (Larso), since when we are friends.

Darko's first Kickstarter campaign is just entering its final day. It is a board game .

updates.update_userinfo: All the rewards have been sent
updates.update_content:
We sent the last 15 packages today. There are only two large packages of several tens of kg left for retailers, which will be sent in a few days. We will report all tracking numbers in the next 2 days (the weekend).

- Two packages have been stuck on the way to the recipient for weeks (probably lost). We have already sent new packages at our own expense.

- One package was delivered to the wrong address and we sent a new package to the backer at our expense.

- One package arrived completely wet, so the recipient refused to accept it. We sent a new package, and we shared the costs with the backer. This is, for now, the only package that has had any major damage.

- One package came back to us. For now, we have no information as to why the backer did not receive it.

- A dozen bakers from Europe paid some import taxes. In update number 32, we offered compensation in the form of an expansion for this game or the next project. We have already sent packages to all those who have stated that they want us to send them an expansion from this project (of their choice).

- One element was missing in one package - a task zone marker. We sent the missing part in a private letter (weighing 8 grams).

This is only a partial summary, when all packages reach the destinations, we will be able to make a complete analysis.

updates.update_userinfo: Expansions and add-ons available at our website
updates.update_content:
Many bakers asked when they would be able to buy expansions or add-ons that they did not order during the Kickstarter campaign or in the pledge manager. As promised, the retail of the game and all expansions starts on our website now.
GAMES AND EXPANSIONS
ADD-ONS
We finally got all the printed sheets from our associates. The assembly is going very fast, since we are already well-coordinated.

updates.update_userinfo: Status, compensation for taxes and the new project
updates.update_content: We have already announced in comments that on April 8, we sent the last order which doesn't contain the "1920s" expansion. We also said that there was a short-term break in production. Our associates: Lucky Graf (printing house) and Alfaplast (print finishing) are small companies with which we have been cooperating for years. They suddenly got one big well-paid job that needs to be done urgently. They asked us if they should accept it because we had already ordered and paid for sheets to be made for the "1920s" aircraft expansion. Due to the long-term cooperation during which they also made concessions to us many times, we agreed that they should finish the job first and then continue to work on our sheets. In these times of crisis, we have to show solidarity, and I hope that the backers will not resent us for the fact that deliveries will be delayed a bit. We should get those sheets in the next few days, and then in our workshop, we’ll manage the assembly and shipping in parallel.

We have to give a comprehensive answer to the questions related to taxes and "EU friendly" status, so we are posting an update about it.

Prior to our first Kickstarter project (2016), we requested information from customs related to taxes (in the EU and other countries). The answer was that Serbia, as a candidate for EU membership, has signed an agreement with the EU according to which no fees are charged if the goods are produced in Serbia. That is why we had wrote that the project has EU friendly status. At that time, we had only about 40 backers from the EU, but still we sent all the games in one shipment to a company in Germany, which then sent packages to individual backers. However, the German customs have charged the import tax then! To our question why, we received the answer that this agreement between Serbia and the EU is non-binding, and that some countries respect it while some not always.

For our next project (Tank Chess), we sent the packages directly from Serbia to the backers. We used regular Mail (for small packages up to 0.5 kg), DHL and Post Export service. Post Export uses an agreement between the State Posts of different countries, and we are told that for shipments sent that way no taxes are charged. At that time, we had over 1000 backers from the EU. We have information that only a small percentage of them paid a fee – if the package went by regular mail or via DHL.

In the announcement of this project, we wrote that the status of EU friendly has been secured. We had two options: to send packages through a fulfillment company from Slovenia, that respects the agreement between the EU and Serbia. The second option was, if there weren't enough backers from the EU to make fulfillment service profitable, to send packages via Post Export. There were enough backers, but we found out that the agreement between Serbia and the EU has not been applied since January (and some countries even earlier), and that taxes are always charged when goods are sent from one company to another! When a package is sent to an individual, each customs office decides for each package individually whether to collect customs tax or not. That is why we send all shipments to the EU via Post Export directly to backers. We still don't have complete information on the number of cases in which customs duties have been collected.

The corona epidemic is the reason why now almost all countries charge regular and some even additional taxes, because a way is being sought to fill the budgets. Our friends from Serbia, who had their successful campaigns recently, decided to produce the games in China. They knew immediately that the taxes would have to be paid when the goods entered the EU, so they collected all the taxes in advance. We did not charge anything in advance, because we believed that no one would pay the fees, because we produce games in our workshop (in Serbia). We even took it upon ourselves to subsidize shipping fees by about 30%. We did not count on the fact that the shipping prices will be increased by 5.5–8.7 USD from January 1. In addition, the packages are much heavier than the original estimate, which is why we pay a much higher price than expected. Fortunately, at least we did not have any large unplanned costs in production.

This situation is new for both us creators and the backers. We are sorry that fees are charged, but, according to the data we have collected so far, this rarely happens. For the next project, we will have to seriously consider how to solve this problem in advance. We will also try to find a way to somehow compensate the fees that our backers had to pay.

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping status and support to our friends
updates.update_content:
We inform the backers that we have continued to send packages. From this week, we believe that we will send 150 packages per week.

We have announced in advance that we charge shipping fees slightly less (by 4–10 USD) than the actual. However, as of January 1, both Post Express and DHL have increased their prices. Depending on the weight of the package and the destination, the price increase ranges from 5.5 to 8.7 USD.

Our estimation for the weight of the basic game (with transport package) was around 1.7kg, but the actual weight is 1.97kg. The increased weight is from many achieved stretch goals and better (and heavier) materials compared to the prototype. Because of this, some packages have moved to a more expensive shipping category. Due to all of the above, our shipping costs have increased a lot, but that is part of the risk that each of the creators accepts when starting their project.

On the accompanying documents with each package, we write much lower prices for both games and shipping fee. The reason is a daily limit in values that we can send packages. With a lower value for each package, we can send more in one day.

There was a short interruption in shipping. We have resolved the issue and will resume shipping shortly.

The interruption was due to errors on the printed sheets. We noticed some mistakes in prepress back in November and they were corrected immediately. On one sheet with bomb and photo markers, the letters A, B and C, in transfer between computers, were accidentally converted into the wrong font (Cyrillic letters). Our co-worker who printed the sheets did not notice it in time, so the sheet was printed with an error. A similar error occurred on one sheet on which the main expansion control panels were printed. Here, the inscriptions on the control panels for observation balloons have also been converted into a different font. See pictures below.

updates.update_userinfo: New project announcement - Age of Dogfights: WWII
updates.update_content:
Back in the period when we announced the campaign for Age of Dogfights: WWI (AoD1) on Facebook, there was more interest in a game covering aerial warfare in the Second World War. However, we wanted to follow the order by starting the Age of Dogfights series from the beginning.

Since it is certain that we will send all AoD1 games during January and February 2021, we want to announce a campaign for Age of Dogfights: WWII (AoD2) in this update and invite backers to follow our further activities on that project.

The rules of the game AoD2 will be very similar to the rules for AoD1, with changes related to the newer aircraft (higher speed, better weapons, etc.). Because of this, the new game rules will be somewhat more complex, but on the other hand some elements will be simpler. For example, WWII aircraft did not use rotary engines (gyroscopic effect), and dorsal machine guns weren't used offensively (there will be fewer positions for offensive firing).

The rules of movement are basically the same, with some key improvements. The number of steps that an aircraft moves is still determined by the sum of its basic and the rolled number on a die. A novelty is introduction of four different blue dice with different range of numbers. Those are , , and die. The green die remains - (limited usage). This gives much more flexibility for aircraft movement.

We are informing you that we sent the first small number of packages on Tuesday, December 29. Tracking numbers have been sent to all recipients. After Orthodox Christmas, we will continue shipping. Most of the packages will be sent in the second half of January, and some will remain for February. PnP files will be ready during January.

Follow our further updates, we will announce the next project soon.

We congratulate all the bakers on the New Year 2021.

* A square space on the dashboard of each aircraft to store its ‘moved’ token.
Please note that this does *not* involve a rules change—the turn order, for example, remains the same—but a suggestion to simplify bookkeeping within the current rules.
I think alternating the movement of groups is better than individual planes. This is more thematic and I think it allows a battle to occur that is more realistic.

One way of remembering which aircraft have moved and which have not would be to provide a small set of counters, one large round token and one small one per plane in the scenario (I think that's 25, if we include the IAS?), stored on the dashboard. They're just black on one side and white on the other, and you flip a plane token over to match the round token to remind you when you've moved that plane. Or, if there's any interest in recording mission duration, instead of the large round token, a linear track or a circular clock with alternating black and white spaces, along with a current time token (ideally wood, for tactility ;) ).

My understanding from the PDF rules page 7 was that "In order for an aircraft to fire offensively - at the last point of its movement path, this piece must come to the firing position." Therefore, an aircraft could only fire after it had completed all its movement.

I think one of the best things about this game is that the player(s) can change things if they want (and agree). I know that several backers have commented on the desire to move individual planes vs groups of planes, and I think the game could be played either way. My personal preference is to move groups, but that's the way I envision the battle in my head. Concerning offensive firing, I'll need to play a few games as the rules are written to see which I prefer. Thanks for pointing this out to me!

I too thought each sides took turns moving 1 plane. I think a possible option would be to move the planes in ascending order according to the speed of the planes. Slow planes would move first while the fastest go last. This would still keep things simple and illustrate that a faster plane could move into a firing solution easier on a slower plane. For planes at the same speed, the plane with lower maneuverability (turns) wpuld move first. Ascending and descending could also play a factor in tie breaks. If a tie persists, one player could be given initiative at the start of the game.
Btw, loving tank chess ^_^
Now we have service ceilings there would be a slightly odd interaction with altitude, but the turn sequence numbers could even be printed on the stands.
Great, thanks for the explanation :)

campaign.story:
HOW IT WORKS
When we prepare fermented vegetables we need to follow some basic principles. This innovative fermenter is set out to provide you with the tools for traditional fermentation that you can easily master.   
Glass weight with a pressing spring holds down the veggies to make sure all the air bubbles caught in the jar can flow up. 
You can pump out the excess air in the jar. Oxygen-free environment helps the good bacteria to thrive.
Mark the date of starting fermentation with built-in fermentation clock and let live organisms do their magic.  
Veggie Fermenter keeps your ferment safe with the one way valve technology. This enables air to come out but not into your ferment.  
It forces the gas out once the pressure builds up. No risk of bottle explosion, no burping the jars needed! 
It catches bad smells that form during the fermentation and efficiently neutralises them with active carbon felt filter positioned on the top lid. 
With stackable top lids you can save space in your pantry by stacking the jars one on top of the other. Who doesn’t need more space?   
SUSTAINABLE
Preserve the vegetables when they are in season and you can’t keep up with them. With fermentation you can store them in the fridge for months. Making small batches of ferment is convenient because you can actually put vegetables and fruits directly from the garden to the fermenting jar. This is an important step to self-sufficiency. You can actually make sure you are never without important nutrients, even when food is not in season or you don’t have access to the stores, etc.
VEGGIE FERMENTER SIZES 
INCLUDES 
COLORS 
REWARDS
You will choose the colors of the lids in a post-campaign survey! 
STRETCH GOAL: $55.000
Tongs & pounder hybrid
Kitchen tool for adding the vegetables and pressing them down in the jar. When we reach the $55k goal, every Kefirko Veggie Fermenter will include this item.

TIMEPLAN
WHY WE NEED YOU
Do you want to eat healthy food rich in good bacteria? Even more, do you want to eat food that is grown locally or in your own garden? And do you want to eat them all year long? With Kefirko Veggie Fermenter you are a step closer to being self-sufficient and to eating nutritious fermented foods that are prepared in your own home. To make this happen, you can play an integral role in the development. With your support we will be able to produce the molds that are needed to manufacture the final product. Join us on our third Kickstarter journey: support our campaign and spread the word!
Thank you, 
Kefirko Team


REVIEWS

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We've successfully completed and fulfilled 2 Kickstarter projects in the last 5 years. The company has established distribution channels in more than 20 countries and direct sales web-store www.kefirko.com with worldwide deliveries.

We understand the challenges that are to be expected when putting a new product into production. Our well-established partnership deals with the suppliers give us confidence in smooth production of the new product.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi everyone!

We are very excited and proud to have finished shipping of this Kickstarter project that was created, produced and delivered in very strange and sometimes difficult times. Thanks again for your support and patience.

We have some great news! 
Today, we officially started shipping the Kefirko Veggie Fermenters. Starting with super early birds tier and so on...
This is quite a project for us and it means all hands on board and also lots of shipping limitations for certain countries due to coronavirus. :( So, please be patient if the package is not with you tomorrow. :) We will try to keep you updated as much as possible on how we ship them out.

Hi everyone!

Let us share a quick update on the delivery. The last missing part is in our country! Yaay! ;) But since our country is practically on lockdown  the shipment will be delivered to us after the holidays. That's OK though, because we plan to start in January and holiday crowds in deliveries will pass by then :)

Visit our website and claim your Black Friday offer!
Up to 40% OFF on kefir grains, fermenters, kombucha cultures, cheese makers, etc.

Hi guys!
How are you all? 
We are again in lockdown in Slovenia and this one is even more strict. It seems we are dealing with this all over the world at the moment, so we need to wait it out patiently.

updates.update_userinfo: Current situation and news on shipping preparations
updates.update_content:
Here we go! This is the next step in getting your product.
The SURVEY is out and you can write your delivery address and other important information about your pledge.
We decided to offer you up to 20% OFF on the items from our Kefirko range too! All you need to do is click here  and pick out the items you want. Then add the shipping costs in regards to the costs you already paid on Kickstarter and send the money via PayPal.

campaign.story:
In the midst pandemic we have decided to present you an already-rolling project, which will enable us to work together with the common aim of fighting the virus that is taking human lives all over the planet.
By joining our forces to find the best solution to this problem, we realised that a tool is needed which will make it possible to avoid unnecessary bare hand contact in everyday errands.
Everyday objects such as light switches, door handles, trolleys and similar are constantly exposed not only to contact, but also to other influences such as coughs and sneezes that can easily transmit the virus to you.
All around the world potentially contaminated surfaces are touched more than 200 times per day.
Virus Reminder - Always at Hand
With every purchase we donate one Corohook to the people who need it the most.
We will be very grateful for your help in any kind of way, and in the case of orders, we will provide immediate delivery after a successful project, or even sooner, which will be announced in our updates.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Moreover, by backing our campaign you become part of our donation project »BUY ONE, GIVE ONE«. Each item sold guarantees a Corohook to public health workers, firefighters, police officers, non-profit organizations and people who cannot afford buying their own Corohook, but need one, just as we all do.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
We are happy to let you know that things are moving forward. The first test Corohooks of our new batch are here, a couple more fixes and they'll be ready. As soon as the quality of the final product is confirmed, they'll be produced and sent on their way to you, the rightfull owners, to help you stay protected in this awful pandemic. You will,  of course, be notified the moment this happens.
Thank you for your patience and and again, thank you so much for your support.

Hey everyone - thanks SO MUCH for backing Corohook! It has easily exceeded its $2K goal, thanks to you, so we're going to be quite busy in the next few days pulling together the orders so you will receive it in time.

Thank you to all the supporters for your help, the project has been successfully funded! We have 12 days left until the end of the campaign, so we will be grateful for the last joint effort before your shipments go on a flight!:)

updates.update_userinfo: We Did it Together, Thank You! 💙

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
1) Products

IAMRUNBOX MINI 

We have been working on the IAMRUNBOX MINI for over a year now and after four prototypes and several tests, we have finally reached the desired results. We are confident that it will please active people all over the world.

SHOPPING BAG

Each shopping bag is made from a sustainable material that is produced of 4 recycled plastic bottles. We completed a small trial order with our sourced fabrics in China and Sweden, where we tested all processes to get ready for mass production.

RUNMASK

Transparency is one of your core values, and we want to be clear about the benefits and shortcomings of our RunMask.
 
It’s important to clarify that no mask provides 100% protection against COVID-19. Also, the effectiveness of this particular mask has yet to be tested.
 
Still, we did base on scientific research for the choice of the materials. As demonstrated by researchers from the Argonne National Laboratory and the University of Chicago (USA), the combination of cotton with other fabrics, including synthetics, can effectively (70-80%) filter aerosol particles that could transmit the COVID-19. The RunMask is made from multi-layered cotton and polyester which ensures proper protection via electrostatic-based filtration. 

Furthermore, the RunMask can be used as a cover placed over a medical-grade as it has a compartment that fits a KN95 filter inside. This enhances protection and prolongs the filter’s usable life if used correctly (right fit to the face).
 
Last but not least, the design of the RunMask is ergonomic, size-adjustable, and weather-resistant, which makes it perfect for outdoor activities.

2) Delivery

Getting products delivered on time is a priority for us. We have years of experience in manufacturing, quality control, and logistics, and have successfully produced and delivered similar products in the past. Also, this is our fifth Kickstarter campaign, and are we confident that our backers will love it as much as our previous products.

However, we cannot guarantee that there will be no delays in delivery due to the COVID-19 situation. Just keep in mind: we are working hard and doing our best to keep our promise.

Whatever challenges we face, our number one goal is to deliver high-quality products on time.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Transparency and sustainability are the base of our production chain. We strive to make high-quality products that have a long-lasting life. 

Our simple yet functional products are durable, weatherproof, and hold your belongings securely in place - through rain, shine, and bumpy rides. Through life.
Sustainable materials
The shopping bag is 100% made from recycled plastic bottles - each bag recycles 4 plastic bottles of 550ml. 

The RunMask is made from multi-layered fabrics that make it breathable, washable, and reusable, besides ensuring proper protection.

The IAMRUNBOX Mini is made from 88% recycled polyester.

updates.update_content:
Dear backers
🌟 We are pleased to inform you that all the products have arrived at our warehouse in the Netherlands. They are being packed and getting ready for worldwide shipping. As soon as they leave the warehouse you will automatically get your tracking numbers via email. 🌟

updates.update_userinfo: 🛫 Products about to arrive to warehouse
updates.update_content:
Dear backers,

All products are currently in transit and should arrive at our warehouse on Monday (9th of November). This means you should get tracking numbers early next week! You will be notified as soon as your order leaves our warehouse.

Dear backers,
We are happy to inform you that all products will be shipped from the factory to our warehouse in the Netherlands on Monday (2.Nov.2020). We are shipping with air freights and don't expect any delays, so it's a quick 1-2 days transit time. We have also done all preparation at our warehouse to make sure we can ship worldwide within a few days after that. And we will get back to you with all tracking numbers as soon as the items are shipped out of the warehouse.
We want to thank you for your patience and support through these challenging times. 🧡

🧡 As promised, here is our weekly update on the AEK shipping. 🧡

Here is a brief sum-up of the latest updates:

Recap
As you know, all products are packed and waiting to come to you!

Dear Backers,
As promised, we are here for a weekly update on the shipping schedule. 
Recap
As you know, all products are packed and waiting to come to you!

Dear backers
As we shared in our last update, everything is set up for shipping.

However, we need to inform you that we didn't manage to make it happen before China's national holidays, which means there will be a delay in the shipment to our warehouse in Europe for worldwide distribution.

Dear backers,
We are happy to inform you that the AEK is READY FOR SHIPPING. 🌟
It's been a challenging & exciting journey from product development to production, packaging, and shipping in COVID-19 times. We couldn't be more satisfied with the final result and we hope you love it as much as we do! 😃
Here is your AEK ready to go home!

Dear backers,
We are so happy and excited to inform you that we are completing the production phase of the Active Essentials Kit. We are also working on the packaging, and they are looking GOOD - check it out! 😉

updates.update_userinfo: 🙌 We will send out the Surveys today!
updates.update_content:
We have teamed up with the kind people over at CrowdOx to send you an extremely simple survey in order to collect the info we need to fulfill your rewards. You should expect to receive the invitation today. The entire process should only take a couple of minutes to complete.
The invitation will be sent directly to the email address linked to your Kickstarter account. Be sure to check your spam folder in case it was captured there!

updates.update_userinfo: Survey is coming! Plus EXTRA GIFT 🎉

We hope all is well with you!
Here is a heads up about our survey. We will share it with you in the upcoming week so that you can choose the color of the products, add extra items, update your shipping information, and collect your rewards. So, STAY TUNNED!

campaign.story:
COVID-19 has devastated the world and taken the lives of so many people. Thousands of businesses have shut down and stopped operations. The virus has caused millions of people to lose their jobs and source of income to take care of their families. The world will feel the impacts of COVID-19 for years to come. How could this have been avoided?
For the longest time, we have been reading, "Employees must wash their hands" at our favorite restaurants, bars, airports, train stations, sporting venues, shopping malls, hospitals, and hotel bathrooms. Why should employees only be required to wash their hands?
We are on a mission to promote global cleanliness with the launch of  "Everyone must wash their hands".
Our Kickstarter is to help fund production and manufacturing for signs and magnetic bumper stickers and wristbands.  We plan to start shipping in September of 2020.
Once we formally start operating and selling, we plan on donating 25% of net income to global charities that focus on helping people impacted by the COVID-19 virus. No money raised through this Kickstarter campaign will directly be donated to charity.
What inspired this Kickstarter?  Nick is the founder and CEO of Bookkeeper360, an accounting platform for small businesses. Bookkeeper360 services hundreds of small business clients across the United States and has been recognized by INC. 5000 and Forbes. After seeing the devastation and impact the COVID-19 virus had on Bookkeeper360's clients, Nick woke up at 4:30 AM one morning, filed a trademark, and decided to launch this initiative to promote global cleanliness. In addition, Nick's family is in the restaurant business, which happens to be one of the most highly impacted industries by the COVID-19 pandemic.
Magnetic Bumper Sticker
Wrist Bands

The budget for production - Manufacturing will require a large minimum order to manufacture the signs, bumper stickers, and wrist bands at an affordable cost. We need your help and support!

campaign.story:
Let's face it. Bacterias are everywhere. There is a lot of surfaces that many people touch multiple times a day. These include:
· Opening doors
· Pressing elevator buttons
· Pressing light switches
· Pressing keypad
· Turning water facets on and off
While washing your hands and using hand sanitizer helps, even if you pay attention to all of the surfaces you touch, it is almost impossible to clean your hands without touching anything else. Let's take responsibility and protect ourselves as individuals and the society from getting sick and try not spread all of the bacterias unconsciously.
Because we believe it is our duty as individuals to be responsible to ourselves, family, friends and our society. Our focus is to prevent spreading bacterias all over the places and that is the reason, that we've inventend Safepoint.
THE BACK STORY
In the past few months the world has shifted in a ways no one could have predicted. Covid-19 came by suprise and turned our lives upside down and in response to that we have become even more germ conscience then ever. In this hard times our top priority is to keep ourselves, our families, friends and all of the society healthy  and safe by staying home and abiding the instructions we have been given. But sometimes we just have to go out, if nothineg else we have to buy groceries and that is the time when we are highly exposed to germs and viruses.
Do not let history repeat itself and do something to make a world a better place by being responsible. Take care. Use Safepoint.
Our campaign starts in April. Hopefully it will finish successfully funded in May. In that case we will start the production in June. As our suppliers are on standby we hope to start the first shipments beginning of July.
We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make a world a safer place.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are more than capable of delivering "Safepoint" to the market.
We proved our competence with our Kickstarter projects "MyPocketMaster" reaching over 5,000$ in backing, "JO- Titanium bottle opener" reaching over 3800$ and "Key master multi-tool" reaching over 3700$ (feel free to check it out).

Although we don't foresee any major problems, we understand that there is always a chance of small delays. We have lowered the risk of failure by making "Safepoint" production process as simple as possible. Our business partners are fully informed about the launch of "Safepoint" and are waiting for the first production orders. The only thing remaining is waiting for your support to help us to meet the goal that we require to bring "Safepoint" to life. Rest assured we'll be updating all backers frequently on our progress.

campaign.story:
About 3 months ago, I was watching a thriller called “Contagion”. The movie is about a fictional story of a pandemic, and the whole world is desperately searching for a cure against an aggressive virus. After that movie, I said: “I hope that never happens in real life!” Unfortunately, it did happen somehow.
That is why we decided to design a product that will help you to stay safe. Around us, there are many viruses and will always be. Our multifunctional carabiner will enable you to do everyday tasks in a safe and easy way.
The Stay Safe carabiner can be used as a door opener, stylus, key carabiner, quick fixer and a box opener.  Carabiner give us quick access to all the functions. It can be clipped on your pants or purse. Because of the germs transmission, we do not recommend carrying it in your pocket. 
Patent pending design

FUNCTIONS
1. CARABINER
The carabiner give us quick access to all the functions and to not carrying it in the pocket. Clip it on your pants, bags or purse. In these days nobody wants to touch the door handle with a hook or a hand and then put it in the pocket. And we recommend, that when you wash your hands, wash also the carabiner.
2. DOOR HOOK
The door hook gap is 2inch (5cm), which will definitely work perfectly with all the standard door handles. 
3. STYLUS
On the carabiner there are 2 points that can be used as a stylus. Every key pad, elevator button, touch screen situation will show you which one to use. 
4. BOX OPENER
In these days, we are all trying to avoid going to the shops, so online shopping is working on full capacities. Because we know, we got many packages these days, we added the function of a box opener, which is very needed in these days. 
5. HEX DRIVER
If you will need any quick fix, hex driver is added on a carabiner. 
THE BACK STORY
In our daily lives, we are constantly touching different public objects and surfaces, like door handles, elevator switches, keyboards, toilets, faucets, kettles, doors, soap dispensers, etc...
We know that all the cleaning stuff is working hard on cleaning all the public surfaces, however that is a never ending story. All of us have to consider, what we can do for our own protection.  
The whole world has fallen into a situation, where we are all more conscious about germs and public surfaces.  Did you ever find yourself in front of the door and trying to find a way to open without touching it? Well... we have and that is why we decided to make a tool for solving some of those problems. 
 How it is made? 
Stay Safe carabiner is made out of 99% COPPER, which is fully recyclable. COPPER is a natural antimicrobial material, therefore is a perfect material for our product. The carabiner spring is made out of stainless steel. 
The carabiner is cut with a Water-jet machine. After we cut the basic shapes, we continue with manual work like sanding, sharping the edge for a box opener, assembling, packaging. 
As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.
 We are TRUSTED PRODUCERS
We have already sucessfully finished some of our Kickstarter projects in the past. You can check it here: Carabinsi, Hudwood, Xavier Wallet. Our website: www.hudwood.com 
 and below are some of the comments:
We have been using our Carabinsi (Jimi and Billy tools) for a few weeks  now, we love them!  Mine goes with me to work every day and the box  opener part of the Billy is used all the time.  Excellent quality  product. :)

I just received mine today, it looks pretty awesome and gave it to my  brother-in-law and he likes it. Also, thank you for the free gift.
Thanks for your great solution. I am very happy with my wallet and the  quality is really great. I use it every day and get positiv feedback  from my environment all the time. It really is an eye-catcher. I  couldn't recommend it more.
Very classy carabiner, excellent workmanship. Now I have a carabiner  that goes with suits that my high tech looking ones clash with.
I received my Wallet and carabiner in Colorado, USA today and I love the craftsmanship.  they are both supurb!  Love them!
Got mine while ago. Thank you. It is simply perfect:)
Got mine yesterday (Dallas, Texas). Exactly what they advertised and love the fact I have a place to put coins.

campaign.story:
Why chew when you can slurp?  
 Why slurp wastefully when you can slurp sustainably? 
Our goal is to help people be healthier, while supporting their community and the planet. Smoothies are great, but can be inconvenient, and wasteful. Orchard Smoothies changes all that.  
 How does Orchard Smoothies work? 
Easy peasy blend n' slurpy.
Step 1: Order online. Subscriptions or one-offs. Free delivery in our service areas. 
Step 2: Kits delivered to your door in glass jars, packed in insulated, reusable bags. 
Step 3: Didn't we tell you already - just blend n' slurp!! 
Step 4: Put containers back out on the next delivery day. 
Step 5: Keep blendin', keep slurpin'.  
Our recipes include nutritious, locally grown fresh fruits and veggies as well as boosts to keep you focused, energized and healthy. Delivered in zero-waste, reusable jars.
Why Orchard Smoothies are better?
This is not your who-cares-about-the-planet way to slurp. We are the greener and better alternative to services like Daily Harvest, smoothie bars or even making your own smoothies.  
Mainstream smoothie companies and even your everyday grocery store produce is sourced from around the world. The fruits and vegetables can sit in cold storage for up to 11 months - ending up losing nutritional value and taste. Ingredients in our kits are sourced from Texas (with some exceptions) and are never frozen so you are guaranteed freshness and high nutritional value.  
What We Need
We need your help so we can optimize our service and spread our message of mindful consumption and modern sustainability.
Your contribution would help us with working capital, building our team and expanding our delivery range. 
Flavors
Our smoothies are created collaboratively by chefs, nutritionists, local produce experts and slurpers like you! What makes our smoothies even more special are the boosts made up of medicinal herbs from around the world, and vegan protein powders - designed to enhance flavor and nutritional value. 
Our single serve kits are $7.99 per 16oz smoothie. Daily Harvest single serve kits are $7.99 per 8oz smoothie. Their smoothies are DOUBLE the price. What you are paying for are the ice-packs, the wasteful packaging and the long distance travel. Save the money and buy yourself a trip to a cool place :) 
Here are two of our featured smoothie kit recipes:
Purely Energizing: A burst of Texas grown apples are combined with other fresh ingredients to give you an energetic, nutrient filled start to the day. The aswagandha herb is known for fortifying adrenal functions and helping modulate stress levels.
Ingredients: Apples*, organic lemon juice*, organic celery, organic kale*, organic cucumber*, aswagandha herb and hemp protein.
         *grown within the state of Texas

Recommended liquid bases: Water, coconut water, milk, any nut milk

Benefits: Energy, Burning Fat, Reducing Stress, Fortifying Adrenal Functions
Purple Mint: When antioxidant laden blueberries mingle with power packed cashews, mint and arjuna herb, the result is a smoothie that is sure to satisfy while helping your heart’s oxygenation and modulate your cholesterol levels. *Contains: Nuts

Ingredients: Blueberries*, organic oranges*, mint*, organic cashews, organic dates, arjuna herb
         *grown within the state of Texas

Recommended Liquid Bases: Water, coconut water, milk, any nut milk

Benefits: Energy, Anti-Inflammatory, Better Skin, Modulate Cholesterol, Heart Health
The Blend N' Slurp Process


Some of the farmers who make our smoothie kits possible:
Crawford Orchard, Idalou, TX, G&S Groves, McAllen TX, Village Farms, Marfa, TX, Patty’s Herbs, Pearsall, TX, Lightsey Farms, Mexia, TX, Makewood Plantation, Huntsville, TX, Joe's Microgreens, Austin, TX
Things That Matter to Us 
Without supporting rural communities and their farmers, city life would look very different. With more and more people moving to cities, the demand for food and other goods is skyrocketing. The farmers we source our fruits and veggies from are right here in Texas, we bring their harvest to you in a way that makes your life easier and their business possible. 
Our glass jars come in 32oz and 16oz portions and are consistently reused throughout our smoothie kit process. 
In a world where single-use packaging is everywhere, we believe Orchard Smoothies has potential for real impact. There will be as much plastic waste in the oceans as there are fish, by 2050. Not what we want those fishies to be slurpin' on! 
Tested, and Ready to Roll 
We have already been testing the concept in partnership with Lettuce (a zero-waste meal kit delivery service). Here’s some feedback we’ve received:  

We put all this feedback and more into a blender, slurped it all down, and the result is this final Orchard Smoothies experience.
With your contributions we can make zero waste the new norm not only in Austin but communities all over. The environment needs all the help it can get, so the little things add up. We believe that small changes equals collective impact. One smoothie kit at a time. 
Operationally speaking, powered by our technology partner, Loconomy, we will use Lettuce's operational infrastructure and delivery network to create and deliver our kits to customers - further reducing wasteful use of resources and helping make our business model more robust.  
About Me & Us
About 8 months ago I packed up my life and drove down to Austin from Philadelphia and took a chance at a new life. This is my first time living alone and it astounded me how much trash accumulated in such a small amount of time. I’m a big foodie, so being new to Austin I am constantly bombarded with food and drinks at every turn. I found myself eating out more than I should and neglecting my kitchen at home, for either convenience reasons or pure laziness. How could I cut down on my waste but maintain that Austin lifestyle I love so dearly? Orchard Smoothies became the solution I didn’t know I needed. It combines the ease of delivery with healthy and waste free alternatives. The best part is I don’t have to take out my trash as often.
But this project is not just me, myself and I. Orchard Smoothies is made up of knowledgable chefs who work with us to make sure our smoothies are nutritious and delicious. An operations team that works very hard to perfect your kits and get deliveries out on time. And a support team ready to answer your questions or address issues. 
The appeal of smoothies for me is that there is a smoothie for everyone, and that reflects your experience here in Austin. You're consuming something that isn’t a big brand, isn’t a ploy for money or your data but something that aims to provide you with a food experience that won’t leave you guessing. No matter who you are, we have a smoothie for you. And this is just the start! 
I am always looking for advice, feedback and support from people like you. So please feel free to reach out, critique my words or applaud my cause, I’d love to hear from you. Thanks for taking a chance with me.
Intsagram
Facebook
 - Ronnie

campaign.story:
Hi, we’re Barbara and Nika and together we’ve created our friendship love-child Swimsor - a sustainable and ethical swimwear brand focusing on timeless design and ultimate comfort!
Our swimwear is made from recycled fishing nets and thus supports the health of our oceans. Designed and produced in Slovenia, Swimsor also builds the local economy. We've designed it for anyone and everyone who’s passionate about our planet, or just enjoys looking good strutting down a beach, feeling comfortable and confident.
We’ve always been passionate about maintaining the health of our planet but also building inclusive communities of women from all walks of life. We’d love for you to join our group of like-minded individuals! 
            ***GIVEAWAY***
Pledge/Pre-Order before Tuesday, March 17th, to be included in a giveaway for one Swimsor top & one Swimsor bottom of your choice! The winner will be announced at the end of the Kickstarter campaign. Giveaway is contingent on reaching (or exceeding!) the fundraising goal.
Our goal is to build a brand that’s fully transparent while raising awareness of ocean pollution and endangered marine species. The fabric we use is made out of recycled fishing nets and other nylon waste, which makes it way better for the environment. We made sure our material and production comply to high quality standards, so you can enjoy our bikinis for years to come. 
We’ve been working on prototypes for over a year to ensure the perfect fit yet still provide the most comfort. All of the designs and prints are made in-house, so they’re exclusive to the Swimsor collection. Our pieces are super comfortable and beautifully timeless.
The first collection presents 3 different styles of tops and 3 of bottoms. They all come in two different colors giving you plenty of options to mix & match the shape and color that suits you best!

           See all the different ways you can wear our bikinis

 Don't need a bikini but still want to support us? 
We've prepared other options, in case you're not in need of a bikini, but still want to support us and be a part of our story 💖
“Discover your purpose” digital workbook
  Swimsor prints (14 x 20cm)
Skin brush (with pdf instructions of how to use it)
How does pledging work?
To pledge means to back up our campaign by purchasing one of the rewards we offer - these are different discounted offers and packages, like our early bird bikini set, our self-care package and so on. There are different rewards ranging from $5 up to $319, so you can support our campaign in any way that fits your budget. You can view all of our rewards on the right side of our campaign page.
How to pledge?
1. Click “Back this Project”: Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page. Each backer may only make one pledge.
2. Payment: Enter your payment information. You won't pay or choose any model at this point, you are only allowing Kickstarter to charge you the cost of the pledge at the end of the campaign if we reach the initial goal.
3. Model, Color & Shipping Information: Don’t worry about that yet! You will receive a survey to tell us your favorite model, color, size and shipping information once the campaign is over.
To all Backers: We will ship worldwide via trackable post. International shipping is $5. Please note that you may be 100% responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable to your region. Funding on Kickstarter is all-or-nothing. You will not be charged for a pledge towards our project unless it reaches its funding goal.
Remember! You are not only making a pledge for a bikini, you are helping 2 girls achieve their dreams.
Our plans for the future:
We’re expanding our collection and creating swimwear that can be worn by women of all shapes and sizes. One of our main goals is to be inclusive and to create a community where every woman feels represented. 


Check out our video campaign for the first collection
#Istartwithmyself
 Every year there are 640.000 tons of fishing nets dumped and discarded in the sea, which entangle and trap more than 100.000 marine animals and destroy their habitat. Experts estimate that more than half of the garment workers in the world are not payed the legal minimum wage. Without any grand schemes or big moves, what can we do to help even in just the smallest way?
It is as simple as making the decision to buy clothing that doesn't cost us our world and the people living on it.

20 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the Swimsor sisterhood and reaching our goal. Click one of the buttons below and tag a soul-sister that cares about the environment. 
@swimsor
@swimsor
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
What size am I? 
Scroll up - we’ve created a size chart for you and a guide on how to take your own measurements. If you’re still not sure please contact us: swimsor@gmail.com

How about the shipping? 
We ship worldwide. International shipping is $5. Please note that you may be 100% responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable to your region.

Because of the nature of this platform, we will unfortunately not be able to accommodate any returns. We can only accept exchanges for a different size or colour or model if we will have it in stock. The shipment will be at your cost. We will help you to get in touch with our nominated courier in order to minimize the expense.

We have an amazing team and will be working around the clock to deliver your items/rewards on time. If there are any hiccups along the way, we will be in tight communication with our backers.

Swimsor is ready for production. By supporting our project, your bikinis will be with you in July, straight from Slovenia.

If you have any more questions please do not hesitate to contact us: swimsor@gmail.com
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
We chose a fabric that is twice as resistant to chlorine, sunscreen, and oils than any other comparable swimwear fabric. We made sure our Slovenian production complies to high-quality standards.
Reusability and recyclability
Our swimwear is made from recycled fishing nets lost at sea, so it not only supports the health of our oceans but repurposes a material that would otherwise go to landfill. Our packaging is made out of compostable renewable plant-based materials like corn and will break down in a home compost in 180 days.
Sustainable materials
Econyl - Synthetic waste such as industrial plastic, waste fabric and fishing nets from oceans, are recycled and regenerated into new nylon yarn that is exactly the same quality as virgin nylon.
This regeneration system focuses on 6 steps that form a closed loop and uses less water and creates less waste and less nitrous oxide (which is 10 times more potent than carbon dioxide) than traditional nylon production methods.
Environmentally friendly factories
We chose a production that is close to home (100km to be exact) which substantially reduces CO2 emissions and supports our local economy. We personally know the people who work there and we can ensure that they are treated well and receive a fair living wage.

updates.update_userinfo: We would like to make swimwear FOR women BY women & we need your help ❤
updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
I hope everyone is doing good (mentally and physically) during this outbreak, keeping busy and not feeding on the news and the drama but rather taking this time to focus on yourself and your loved ones.
Stuck at home, dreaming about summer I came up with an idea. I've created a to find out what a woman actually needs when buying a swimsuit. I would like to question as many women as possible to really understand your needs and wants when it comes to dressing up or dressing down for the beach. This will help me curate my next collection and you can be apart of it, how exciting is that!

updates.update_userinfo: You don't want to miss this!
updates.update_content:
We are coming to the end of our journey and it has been a wild one. Since we launched the world has changed overnight. Thank you for being there for us and believing in our cause even with all this madness going on.
We have less than 24 hours to reach our goal and to be honest it's a bit of a mission impossible but HEY never give up on your dreams even when they seem impossible. So I would like to personally give you a little reminder to dream big and be fearless! If we've learned anything in the past few months, it's that life is short and it can change in a split second. Remember, you are not alone in this, share the love with your fellow humankind and create everything from your heart. Follow your passion and trust your instinct. Everything will work out, best-case scenario! ;)

campaign.story:
We are MIRET and we have combined the strongest natural fibres to craft sneakers which are kind to your feet as much as they are kind to nature. Not only can they substitute synthetic materials, but in many ways they are far better than plastic. We are using 10 amazing plants: hemp, kenaf, linen, cork tree, wood, corn, jute, eucalyptus, rubber tree and New Zealand wool to craft our 97% ecological MIRET sneakers.  


MIRET Woodies are premium VEGAN-friendly sneakers. With a silky smooth surface they look like premium leather sneakers, but this is not leather at all. They are made with a very fine layer of smoothly polished Oak wood. Yes, you are reading this correctly. A thin layer of wood which is flexible because it is cut with a laser into tiny squares. The surface resembles premium leather with it is silky smooth touch, but the sneakers are completely vegan. The feel and the look of the sneakers are special and you can actually see the natural rings of the wood in the texture.  
We are industry insiders who have inherited a factory from our father in our 20s. We have manufactured sneakers for some of the most famous high-end brands in the world. We realised that the footwear industry is apocalyptic to nature because the materials used in the shoe industry are downright horrible.     
Footwear has a detrimental effect on the environment. Made out of plastic and leather, 20.000.000.000 pairs were manufactured just in 2019. Polyester and rubber are made from oil derivatives and are the source of micro-plastics that pollute our grounds, seas, air, water, and ultimately ending up on our plates. Most people think that leather is natural, but actually, it is filled with very toxic chemicals, most often heavy metals like chromium. When trends fade, we discard sneakers while putting an unbearable burden on Earth's ecosystems.   
Using our manufacturing expertise we redesigned sneakers from the bottom up, making them compatible with nature. We decided to change ourselves, our setting and most importantly - the industry.       
We have traveled the world searching for new materials. It was a five-year-long journey of research, tests and development filled with ups and downs, tears and joy. 
The result of our quest are MIRET supernatural materials. Not only can they substitute synthetic materials but in many ways they are far better than plastic. We are using 10 amazing plants: hemp, kenaf, linen, cork tree, wood, corn, jute, eucalyptus, rubber tree and New Zealand wool to craft our 97% ecological MIRET sneakers. 
MIRET sneakers are super soft and cozy from the moment you put them on. They are flexible and will keep your feet happy during long walks. 
Our new outsole contains no oil-based synthetic rubber whatsoever. It is pure natural latex, harvested from rubber trees - this makes the outsole softer and more flexible than any other rubber out there.       
PLAY

MIRET ultra-light insoles are made from cork throughout and protected by a natural textile. They are ergonomically shaped and even food-grade certified, so your dog can chew on them safely. 🐕  
PLAY

The pure hemp lining allows the breeze to travel through the fabric to keep it fresh.    
PLAY

Hemp lining is naturally odour-resistant, while cork is on a whole other level. About 45% of the mass of cork is a waxy compound known as suberin, and it makes cork naturally mold and mildew resistant, as well as resistant to termites and fire.
The outer fabric of our sneakers is protected by a special natural water repellent layer so you can be safe even when it rains. Standard water repellent treatments are petroleum-based and harmful for the environment, especially for aquatic life, but our water protection is 100% natural. The layer works by mimicking the self-cleaning effect of the lotus flower and degrades naturally with zero impact on the environment. This will also keep your sneakers clean for much longer.  
MIRET water protection is 100% natural
Because it's hard and expensive. We’ve spent five years making MIRET 97% super-ecological sneakers. That means they are almost entirely made out of natural materials, safe for the environment and your health. The remaining 3% is synthetic glue and polyester thread. We will tackle this  3% very soon. Our vision is to create a 100% ecological and home-compostable sneaker, and with each new generation MIRET sneakers we are getting closer to this goal.
Our super 97% ecological sneakers are all identical in anatomy, but there are five different varieties of outer layer materials:
 Hempies: 100% pure hemp outer layer - vegan-friendly  
 Woolies: 100% pure wool outer layer - vegetarian-friendly  
 Fluffies: 100% pure fluffy wool outer layer - vegetarian-friendly  
 Veggies: biodegradable textile outer layer - vegan-friendly  
 Woodies: oak wood outer layer - vegan-friendly  
MIRET Hempies are VEGAN-friendly. We have developed a pure hemp textile for MIRET Hempies. It is naturally breathable, strong but soft, anti-bacterial and with a low environmental impact. Grown on European farms and fully processed in Europe while maintaining every stage of the manufacturing process as healthy as possible to the individual and to the environment. Hemp gets softer the more you wear it and provides natural optimal temperature regulation. Our hemp is completely unbleached and undyed.
MIRET Woolies and Fluffies are VEGETARIAN-friendly and their textile is 100% pure wool. Woolies textile is certified by the most rigorous ecological certifications in the world Cradle to Cradle™ which guarantees the highest possible standards of safety the environment, while Fluffies textile is certified by Oeko-tex® and EU Ecolabel®. All of our sheep live happily in New Zealand.
MIRET Veggies are VEGAN-friendly. Our Veggies are made from vegan biodegradable textile, developed specifically for MIRET. The Cradle to Cradle™ certified material is strong and durable enough to replace the standard polyester textile, but can be fully compostable when the sneakers are discarded. The laboratory tests showed the plants grow better when our material is mixed into the soil.  
MIRET Woodies are premium VEGAN-friendly sneakers. With a silky smooth surface they look like premium leather sneakers, but this is not leather at all. They are made with a very fine layer of smoothly polished Oak wood. Yes, you are reading this correctly. A thin layer of wood which is flexible because it is cut with a laser into tiny squares. The surface resembles premium leather with it is silky smooth touch, but the sneakers are completely vegan. The feel and the look of the sneakers are special and you can actually see the natural rings of the wood in the texture.  

PLAY

In 2019 we have launched our first-generation MIRET sneakers and sold 800 pairs. We received a ton of feedback and this is one of the reasons why we pushed the envelope and developed a much improved second generation of ecological sneakers. Our new product features 97% bio-based ecological materials, innovative construction and much-improved comfort and durability.     
Our manufacturing partners come from nine European Union countries and every single one of them is thinking green.   
All sizes matter. US: 3-14, EU: 34-49. We made sure you can fit your whole family with MIRET by making them in a wide range of sizes. When we decided we wanted to make a change in the shoe industry, we knew we needed everyone on board, no matter their shoe size.   
Our new sneakers are ready for production and we are ready for the next logical step. We need heroes like you to take our MIRET sneakers wherever you choose to go. 
1. Choose a pledge 
Choose one of the pledges on the top-right side of this page. You can choose only one pledge.
2. Payment
Enter your payment information. Your payment is secure and you will not be charged until the very end of this campaign.
3. Choose your shoe size, colour and shipping details
You don’t need to worry about that yet. You will choose your shoe size and your shoe-colour after the campaign ends. We will send detailed instructions to you on how to choose your shoe-size and your colours after the campaign ends on the 2nd of April. Right now, if you want to pre-order your shoes, you just need to choose your pledge and proceed with the payment. 

Remember that crowdfunding works through pre-orders. Once our campaign ends on the 2nd of April, we will start with the production of your sneakers. Deliveries of finished sneakers are expected to start the beginning of July.  
This is us, MIRET brothers
Hrvoje and Domagoj Boljar
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Creating a top product and making our backers happy is our primary mission. We promise to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues that may arise.

We are an experienced team with more than 10 years of experience in footwear development and manufacturing. This is the 2nd generation of MIRET sneakers and is ready for serial production. Our 1st generation was launched in 2019, and we got amazing feedback from our customers. We have organized and prepared everything in line to bring you the best quality product.

With the creation of any new product that includes manufacturing processes, there can be a number of unforeseen risks and obstacles. We will do everything we can to eliminate any possible interruption during production and delivery. If something unexpected happens, we will keep you up to date. However, from our side comes the fact that MIRET is already a finished and developed product. We need your final push to bring this product to its final production run.

The biggest challenge that we could probably face is the unexpected number of backers and therefore some products might not be ready for the scheduled delivery as planned. All materials are sourced from our stable suppliers, all of which are based in the EU. Our factory is local, well established and experienced in co-working and production. We will do our best to scale the production if needed so each of you can receive your MIRET sneakers in the shortest possible amount of time.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
With over 10 years of experience in footwear development and production, we are experts in crafting quality sneakers. We have spent the last 5 years searching and developing sustainable and ecological materials for our sneakers. MIRET 97% ecological materials are strong, durable and natural at the same time. Developed with the latest technologies and ecological knowledge, our wool textile materials are Cradle to Cradle™ SILVER certified. Our fluffy wool materials are Oeko-tex® and EU Ecolabel® certified, and our veggies textile is Cradle to Cradle™ GOLD certified. All of our sneakers are protected with an innovative water repellent layer that protects the sneaker from water. It also protects the sneakers from dirt and stains which increases the lifespan of the sneaker as they do not need to be washed so often. The layer works by mimicking the self-cleaning effect of the lotus flower. Usually the water repellant treatments are far from being eco-friendly, but are very harmful for aquatic life. Our layer is completely natural and degrades naturally with zero impact on the environment. The inside of MIRET sneakers is made out of 100% natural, un-bleached and un-dyed hemp which is naturally anti-bacterial and odour resistant. MIRET ultra-light insoles are made from cork throughout and protected by a natural textile. Cork is amazing because about 45% of the mass of cork is a waxy compound known as suberin which makes cork naturally mold and mildew resistant, as well as resistant to termites and fire. In 2019 we have launched our first generation MIRET sneakers which was an amazing test for us. We have received a lot of feedback which we have used to design our new much-improved generation of sneakers — more durable, more comfortable, more eco-friendly. MIRET sneakers are made with 97% natural materials. The remaining 3% is synthetic glue and polyester thread. This 3 % is actually making our sneakers more sustainable because they are greatly improving the durability, and ultimately reducing waste. We will tackle this 3% very soon.
Reusability and recyclability
Using our manufacturing expertise we redesigned sneakers from the bottom up, making them compatible with nature. The design of our sneakers is defined by optimised material consumption. We have reduced the complexity of the aesthetics in order to reduce cutting waste. The waste generated during the manufacturing process will be collected, composted and turned to plant food.
Sustainable materials
MIRET supernatural materials are not only a great substitute for synthetic materials, but in many ways, they are far better than synthetics. We are using 10 amazing plants to craft our sneakers: hemp, kenaf, linen, cork tree, wood, corn, jute, eucalyptus, rubber tree and New Zealand wool. Classical sneakers are made out of many different components which makes recycling virtually impossible. Over the course of our 5-year development, we have successfully replaced non-sustainable components with ecological alternatives, one by one. Our vision is to create a 100% ecological and home-compostable sneaker, and with each new generation MIRET sneakers we are getting closer to this goal. Our hemp materials are VEGAN-friendly, custom developed for MIRET, and with a super low environmental impact. Grown on European farms and fully processed in Europe while maintaining every stage of the manufacturing process as healthy as possible to the individual and to the environment. MIRET fluffy wool sneakers are VEGETARIAN-friendly. The fluffy wool textile is 100% pure wool and certified by Oeko-tex® and EU Ecolabel®, while Woolies textile is certified by the rigorous ecological certification Cradle to Cradle™ SILVER certificate. MIRET veggies sneakers are VEGAN-friendly. They are made with a vegan biodegradable textile, developed specifically for MIRET. The Cradle to Cradle™ GOLD certified material is strong and durable enough to replace the standard polyester textile but can be fully compostable.
Environmentally friendly factories
In our five year-long search of sustainable materials we have found a lot of companies claiming their materials are sustainable. But in reality, only a handful of them are true to their cause. The carefully chosen dozen have become our manufacturing partners. They are located in 9 different European countries and all of them have green hearts and green minds. By having all of our supply chain partners in the EU, we are reducing transport costs and CO2 emissions. All of our sneakers are ethically manufactured in Croatia, where EU regulations ensure fair wages, good working conditions and good labour ethics.
Sustainable Distribution
Wherever possible, we use couriers which offer CO2 neutral deliveries. Our shoe box is a shipping box as well, which eliminates the need for two boxes. Our shoe box is designed in a way that it can be assembled without glue or tape, cut of one piece recycled cardboard. We are closing our boxes with a piece of 100% natural rope, instead of using tape or adhesive seals whatsoever. Our boxes have a notice printed on them which says: “Reuse the box before recycling”, which not only encourages recycling, but encouraging upcycling first.
Something else
Our insoles are baby-food-grade safe certified.
The tips of our shoe-laces look like plastic, but they are actually pure natural wood cellulose.

comments.content: I received my pair of Miret shoes. Sadly, they fit, but I think they are too small. The removable footbed is great but too small in the heel cup, and cuts into the bottom of my feet instead of comfortably cradling my whole foot. I wish it was otherwise, thanks.
Can you give an approximately delivery date? I didn't receive my order!
Got my shoes on my return from holidays. They are awesome. Well made and good looking, as promised. Perfect. As it was their campaign. Well done guys!
Hi! I got the Veggie's plum kitten from my order but did not receive the Veggie's black pepper. Would you mind looking into it? We are Karlovac.
Received. Thanks!

Got my veggie shoes on July 30th (Houston, TX, USA) and I am freaking BLOWN away by how AWESOME they are! Where do I begin? The craftsmanship is beyong exceptional. The stitching is solid and every part of the shoe is well crafted. Attention to detail is evident here. The fit is great and they are so comfortable on my feet. Walking in them feels like a dream. All the materials that make up the shoe are top notch quality. This shoe rivals and even surpasses more well known shoe brands. Love the color and it even has a pleasant scent to them. I am obsessed and will buy more of this shoe. Glad there is a shoe company out there trying to do better by the environment & people! Spread the word! More people must know about this shoe company and their positive mission! GREAT job MIRET!!
Color is exactly as i expected, for both models. Manufacturing is great, and feel so comfy. i really appreciated the handwritten note. Great job guys, wish you all the best!

Hi, I sent a direct message to you on Kickstarter a few weeks ago but haven’t heard back yet. It’s regarding sizing. Can you please respond ASAP so I may return my survey. Message has specifics. Thank you so much 🙏🏼
I have either missed it or have not received my survey. Can you send me another one to fill out please? Thank you & have a good day! Stay safe & healthy all !
I did receive it! Thanks so much.
I too haven't received the survey link. Checked in the SPAM folder as well and nothing there. Could you resend it, please?
And the socks? any change because of that?
Dunja
Thank you! :)
Also, I just thought about it now. If I make a stain on it, how can I wash it? Since the outer layer is wool, will it be easy to clean or will it pill or something?
Thanks for your effort. I appreciate it. And I am sorry I have to leave for now. Good luck with the project!

Hi Creator, any luck negotiating shipping to Indonesia? I'd like to try your shoe but the shipping is kind of deal breaker for me, almost half the product price. With the tax included, I can possibly pay double or more to have your shoe on my feet.

campaign.story:
What are microgreens and why should you care?
Microgreens have gained a lot of popularity in the last years due to their extremely high nutrient density (up to 40x more nutrients than fully grown vegetables*). They are delicious and they look so great on your plate.
Microgreens are an early stage in a plant's growth - instead of waiting months for the plant to grow, we eat it in the 7-12 day period after the germination.
And the best part - You can grow them in your apartment. With Evolve Garden, the process is so easy, a 3-year-olds can do it (we have tried) and the result is so delicious, they will want to eat them too.
 * USDA study that shows microgreens contain 4 to 40 times the nutrients of their mature counterparts - https://agnr.umd.edu/news/mighty-microgreens
Evolve Garden is an extremely easy and fast way to grow your own greens and herbs in 7 days - just add water?
Every microgreens grower will tell you that growing your own greens is easy... but they will start talking about water pH, blackout times and different types of growing mediums in the same breath. That's just too complicated, there must be a better way, right?
PLAY

 Evolve Garden makes growing microgreens easy for everyone. 
We created an easy to use, "all-inclusive" kit that provides you with everything you need to start (and continue) growing your greens in no time, with no mess and no guessing if you are doing it right.
PLAY

No soil = no mess
Working with soil may be fun sometimes. But planting seeds in soil indoors can be time consuming and messy. So, we ditched the soil and developed a growing system that uses special coconut fiber mats - no mess.
Coconut growing mat holds water extremely well, for 10 days or more. That means you won't have to worry about watering your greens. And it's weaved together, so it doesn't make a mess. When you harvest your greens, just roll it up and throw it on your compost pile or organic waste bin - it's 100% natural and compostable. 
Only water once
I admit. I can't keep a cactus alive. That is why Evolve Garden is designed especially for growing microgreens and herbs. Growing mats are full of tiny spaces that hold the perfect amount of air and water to provide nutrients to your plants for over 10 days.
That means you don't have to worry about watering your greens, just add water in the beginning and forget about them until they are ready to harvest approximately 1 week later.
When you are done, just throw it into composting bin
Everything about Evolve Garden is natural. When you harvest your lush, yummy greens, you are left with an empty growing mat. You can simply throw it in the composting bin or on your compost pile. It is 100% biodegradable.
You can grow up to 300g of microgreens from just one Evolve seed pad. Every starter kit comes with 2 seed packs, so you can grow almost $100 worth of microgreens in your first month!
Simply cut your greens with scissors or a sharp knife. You can cut them all at once and store in fridge for up to 2 weeks, or you can cut them as you go.
Microgreens are getting popular, but they are still hard to come by in some countries. If you can find them in farmer markets or supermarkets, they are not always fresh and they can cost a lot.
Why not grow them yourself?
It's fun watching these greens grow. You will be amazed at what a difference even a few hours make.
You will know your greens are as fresh as they can be.
And you can save a lot of money.
Beautifully crafted wooden frames.
Every Evolve Garden kit comes with a modern wooden frame. The frame is designed to provide support for the growing tray and expose your greens to as much light as possible.
It's also designed to fit into our vertical stand. If you are serious about growing microgreens, have a large family or even a restaurant, you can easily slide these frames into the Evolve strand and save a lot of space.
Evolve Garden looks great on any countertop, shelf or window sill. It's like a piece of furniture and the contrast between wood and greens is really something to look at.
Estimated shipping time - EU backers in February 2020, USA a few months later.
We are based in the EU. All of the Evolve Garden parts are produced in the EU and our seed are grown locally, under one of the strictest agriculture legislation in the world.
We have already made a small number of Evolve Gardens and we have figured out most of the mass production processes.
We are planning on sending out the first batch (Early bird) of Evolve Gardens to our European backers in late February 2020 with other rewards following shortly after.
Unfortunately, we will need more time to sort out shipping of the live seeds to the USA so our American backers will start receiving their Evolve Gardens 2-3 months later.
Frequently Asked Questions
Can I grow microgreens in my apartment, in my climate?
Short answer: Yes. Microgreens can be grown in all climates, at all times of the year and take up so little space you can grow them even in a small apartment.
They don't relly much on external factors for their growth - just a little bit of light and some water is fine. They don't need to be fertilized, because all the nutrients they need for growth are present in the seed, so you know there are no nasty chemicals involved.
Visit our website to see a full list of frequently asked questions.
What varieties of microgreens can I grow with Evolve Garden? 
There are 10 varieties of greens available from the start with more to come in the future.
There are dozens of microgreens and herbs that you can grow at home, some are very forgiving and some a bit harder to maintain. But, we had to start somewhere.
We handpicked 10 different greens to start with.
After the initial period, we will start adding new, interesting and seasonal seed packs to our web store. The possibilities are endless. From the bright red Amaranth to almost black Dark Opal Basil and everything in between.
Subscribe to our growing packs and save
With every Evolve Garden starter kit, you get 2 seed packs to get you started. You can order more seed packs from the start or buy them later from our web store.
But, you don't need to choose and go through the process of buying seed packs every few weeks - we are rolling out a subscription service.
Simply subscribe, tell us what your favorite flavors are and every month you will receive new seed packs. You can save time and money by subscribing, plus, there will a small surprise included with every package you get.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Supply chain
We developed the product to the phase where it is ready to be sent out to consumers. However, there are some challenges and risks involved. Evolve Garden is produced locally and some parts are hand finished. Out supply chain has not been "stress-tested" so there may be delays when it comes to mass production.

Seed availability
Evolve Garden contains live plant seeds. We have chosen varieties that are easy to grow and widely available. However, seed availability is not 100% guaranteed - there may be a shortage of certain variety due to natural phenomenons. We have prepared a list of over 20 microgreens varieties so we will be able to find a suitable exchange with similar properties if one variety of seeds becomes unavailable.

Sending to counties outside of EU
We are an EU based company and we are proud that every part of Evolve Garden is built in the EU. We are using local suppliers that are as close to our headquarters as possible. We are planning on sending Evolve Garden worldwide. Since it contains live plant seeds, there may be some issues with customs and regulations. We will be solving these problems by using fulfillment centers in all of the major countries.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hi, 
first, we would like to thank backers as well as everyone who liked and shared our idea of making this world healthier and more sustainable on social media, told friends about it or contributed in any other way.
As you have seen, our campaign did not go as planned. Kickstarter has become a demanding channel to raise money. We got many enthusiastic and encouraging e-mails from you in the past weeks, but we just couldn't reach enough people to meet our funding goal, so we had to cut our campaign short.
